Step:5 Hold the bridge position for a few seconds.
Step:6 Slowly lower your hips back down to the starting position.
Step:7 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

name: intermediate style kneeling plank tap shoulder (male)
instructions: Step:1 Start in a kneeling position with your hands on the ground, shoulder-width apart.
Step:2 Extend your legs behind you, resting on your toes, and lift your body into a plank position.
Step:3 (intermediate variation) Keeping your core engaged and your hips stable, lift one hand off the ground and tap the opposite shoulder.
Step:4 Return the hand to the ground and repeat with the other hand.
Step:5 Continue alternating sides for the desired number of repetitions.

name: inverse leg curl (bench support)
instructions: Step:1 Lie face down on a bench with your hips at the edge and your legs extended straight behind you.
Step:2 Hold onto the bench for support.
Step:3 Keeping your upper body still, bend your knees and curl your legs towards your glutes.
Step:4 Pause for a moment at the top, then slowly extend your legs back to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

name: inverse leg curl (on pull-up cable machine)
instructions: Step:1 Adjust the cable machine so that the ankle straps are at the lowest setting.
Step:2 Lie face down on the bench with your legs extended and the ankle straps attached to your feet.
Step:3 Hold onto the handles of the bench for stability.
Step:4 Bend your knees and curl your legs towards your glutes, squeezing your hamstrings.
Step:5 Pause for a moment at the top of the movement, then slowly lower your legs back to the starting position.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

name: inverted row
instructions: Step:1 Set up a bar at waist height or use a suspension trainer.
Step:2 Stand facing the bar or suspension trainer, with your feet shoulder-width apart.
Step:3 Grab the bar or handles with an overhand grip, slightly wider than shoulder-width apart.
Step:4 Lean back, keeping your body straight and your heels on the ground.
Step:5 Pull your chest towards the bar or handles, squeezing your shoulder blades together.
Step:6 Pause for a moment at the top, then slowly lower yourself back to the starting position.
Step:7 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

name: inverted row bent knees
instructions: Step:1 Set up a bar at waist height and lie underneath it.
Step:2 Grab the bar with an overhand grip, slightly wider than shoulder-width apart.
Step:3 Position your body so that your heels are on the ground and your body is straight.
Step:4 Pull your chest up towards the bar by squeezing your shoulder blades together.
Step:5 Pause for a moment at the top, then slowly lower your body back down to the starting position.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

name: inverted row on bench
instructions: Step:1 Set up a bench at a height that allows your body to hang freely underneath it.
Step:2 Lie face up on the ground with your head towards the bench.
Step:3 Reach up and grab the bench with an overhand grip, slightly wider than shoulder-width apart.
Step:4 Position your body so that your heels are on the ground and your arms are fully extended.
Step:5 Engage your core and squeeze your shoulder blades together as you pull your chest up towards the bench.
Step:6 Pause for a moment at the top of the movement, then slowly lower your body back down to the starting position.
Step:7 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

name: inverted row v. 2
instructions: Step:1 Set up a bar at waist height on a Smith machine or use a suspension trainer.
Step:2 Stand facing the bar or suspension trainer and grab it with an overhand grip, hands shoulder-width apart.
Step:3 Walk your feet forward, leaning back until your body is at a slight angle.
Step:4 Keep your body straight and pull your chest up towards the bar or handles, squeezing your shoulder blades together.
Step:5 Pause for a moment at the top, then slowly lower yourself back down to the starting position.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

name: inverted row with straps
instructions: Step:1 Set up a suspension trainer or straps at chest height.
Step:2 Stand facing the anchor point and grab the handles with an overhand grip.
Step:3 Walk your feet forward, leaning back until your body is at an angle.
Step:4 Keep your body straight and engage your core.
Step:5 Pull your chest towards the handles, squeezing your shoulder blades together.
Step:6 Pause for a moment at the top, then slowly lower yourself back to the starting position.
Step:7 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

name: inverted style inverse leg curl (on pull-up cable machine)
instructions: Step:1 Adjust the cable machine so that the ankle straps are at the lowest setting.
Step:2 Lie face down on the bench with your legs extended and the ankle straps attached to your feet.
Step:3 Hold onto the handles of the bench for stability.
Step:4 Bend your knees and curl your legs towards your glutes, squeezing your hamstrings.
Step:5 Pause for a moment at the top of the movement, then slowly lower your legs back to the starting position.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions. Maintain inverted form throughout.

name: iron cross stretch
instructions: Step:1 Lie flat on your back with your arms extended out to the sides.
Step:2 Raise your legs up towards the ceiling, keeping them straight.
Step:3 Slowly lower your legs to one side, aiming to touch the floor with your feet.
Step:4 Hold the stretch for a few seconds, then return your legs to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat the stretch on the other side.
Step:6 Continue alternating sides for the desired number of repetitions.

name: iron cross stretch - deep variation
instructions: Step:1 Lie flat on your back with your arms extended out to the sides.
Step:2 Raise your legs up towards the ceiling, keeping them straight.
Step:3 Slowly lower your legs to one side, aiming to touch the floor with your feet.
Step:4 Hold the stretch for a few seconds, then return your legs to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat the stretch on the other side. Maintain deep form throughout.
Step:6 Continue alternating sides for the desired number of repetitions.

name: isometric chest squeeze
instructions: Step:1 Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart and your knees slightly bent.
Step:2 Extend your arms straight out in front of you, parallel to the ground, with your palms facing each other.
Step:3 Squeeze your chest muscles together as hard as you can, while keeping your arms straight.
Step:4 Hold this position for a few seconds, focusing on contracting your chest muscles.
Step:5 Release the squeeze and relax your chest muscles.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

name: isometric wipers
instructions: Step:1 Start by lying flat on your back on a mat or bench.
Step:2 Extend your arms straight out to the sides, perpendicular to your body.
Step:3 Engage your core and lift both legs off the ground, keeping them together and straight.
Step:4 Slowly lower your legs to one side, aiming to touch the ground with your feet while maintaining control.
Step:5 Pause for a moment, then use your core to lift your legs back to the starting position.
Step:6 Repeat the movement, this time lowering your legs to the opposite side.
Step:7 Continue alternating sides for the desired number of repetitions.

name: jack burpee
instructions: Step:1 Start in a standing position with your feet shoulder-width apart.
Step:2 Lower your body into a squat position, placing your hands on the ground in front of you.
Step:3 Kick your feet back, landing in a push-up position.
Step:4 Perform a push-up, lowering your chest to the ground and then pushing back up.
Step:5 Jump your feet forward, landing in a squat position.
Step:6 Jump up explosively, reaching your arms overhead.
Step:7 Land softly and immediately lower back into the squat position to begin the next repetition.

name: jack jump (male)
instructions: Step:1 Stand with your feet together and your arms by your sides.
Step:2 Jump up, spreading your feet apart and raising your arms above your head.
Step:3 As you land, quickly jump back to the starting position.
Step:4 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

name: jackknife sit-up
instructions: Step:1 Lie flat on your back with your legs extended and your arms overhead.
Step:2 Engage your core and lift your legs and upper body simultaneously, reaching your hands towards your toes.
Step:3 Pause for a moment at the top, then slowly lower your legs and upper body back down to the starting position.
Step:4 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

name: janda sit-up
instructions: Step:1 Lie flat on your back with your knees bent and feet flat on the ground.
Step:2 Place your hands behind your head with your elbows pointing outwards.
Step:3 Engaging your abs, slowly lift your upper body off the ground, curling forward until your torso is at a 45-degree angle.
Step:4 Pause for a moment at the top, then slowly lower your upper body back down to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

name: jump squat
instructions: Step:1 Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart.
Step:2 Lower your body into a squat position by bending your knees and pushing your hips back.
Step:3 Jump explosively off the ground, extending your hips, knees, and ankles.
Step:4 While in mid-air, quickly bring your arms forward for balance.
Step:5 Land softly on the balls of your feet and immediately go into the next repetition.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

name: jump squat v. 2
instructions: Step:1 Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart.
Step:2 Lower your body into a squat position by bending your knees and pushing your hips back.
Step:3 Jump explosively, extending your hips and knees fully.
Step:4 Land softly on the balls of your feet and immediately lower your body back into a squat position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

name: kick out sit
instructions: Step:1 Sit on the edge of a bench or chair with your feet flat on the ground and your knees bent at a 90-degree angle.
Step:2 Lean back slightly and place your hands on the edge of the bench or chair for support.
Step:3 Engaging your hamstrings, lift your feet off the ground and extend your legs straight out in front of you.
Step:4 Pause for a moment at the top, then slowly bend your knees and bring your feet back towards your body.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

name: kipping muscle up
instructions: Step:1 Start by hanging from a pull-up bar with an overhand grip, hands slightly wider than shoulder-width apart.
Step:2 Engage your core and use a swinging motion to generate momentum.
Step:3 As you swing forward, pull your chest towards the bar, using your lats and biceps to initiate the movement.
Step:4 Continue the upward motion until your chest reaches the bar, then transition into a dip position by pushing down on the bar and extending your arms.
Step:5 Lower yourself back down to the starting position by bending your arms and controlling the descent.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

name: kipping muscle up with triple
instructions: Step:1 Start by hanging from a pull-up bar with an overhand grip, hands slightly wider than shoulder-width apart.
Step:2 Engage your core and use a swinging motion to generate momentum.
Step:3 As you swing forward, pull your chest towards the bar, using your lats and biceps to initiate the movement. Emphasize triple control.
Step:4 Continue the upward motion until your chest reaches the bar, then transition into a dip position by pushing down on the bar and extending your arms.
Step:5 Lower yourself back down to the starting position by bending your arms and controlling the descent.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

name: knee touch crunch
instructions: Step:1 Lie flat on your back with your knees bent and feet flat on the ground.
Step:2 Place your hands behind your head with your elbows pointing outwards.
Step:3 Engaging your abs, lift your shoulder blades off the ground and reach your right hand towards your left knee.
Step:4 Return to the starting position and repeat, this time reaching your left hand towards your right knee.
Step:5 Continue alternating sides for the desired number of repetitions.

name: kneeling lat stretch
instructions: Step:1 Kneel on the ground with your knees hip-width apart and your toes pointing back.
Step:2 Extend your arms overhead and interlace your fingers.
Step:3 Keeping your back straight, slowly lean to the right side, feeling a stretch in your left lat muscle.
Step:4 Hold the stretch for 20-30 seconds, then return to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat the stretch on the left side, leaning to the left and feeling a stretch in your right lat muscle.
Step:6 Continue alternating sides for the desired number of repetitions.

name: kneeling plank tap shoulder (male)
instructions: Step:1 Start in a kneeling position with your hands on the ground, shoulder-width apart.
Step:2 Extend your legs behind you, resting on your toes, and lift your body into a plank position.
Step:3 Keeping your core engaged and your hips stable, lift one hand off the ground and tap the opposite shoulder.
Step:4 Return the hand to the ground and repeat with the other hand.
Step:5 Continue alternating sides for the desired number of repetitions.

name: kneeling push-up (male)
instructions: Step:1 Start by kneeling on the ground with your hands shoulder-width apart, fingers pointing forward.
Step:2 Extend your legs behind you, resting on the balls of your feet, so that your body forms a straight line from head to heels.
Step:3 Engage your core and lower your body towards the ground by bending your elbows, keeping them close to your sides.
Step:4 Continue lowering until your chest is just above the ground, then push back up to the starting position by straightening your arms.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

name: korean dips
instructions: Step:1 Position yourself between two parallel bars with your arms extended and supporting your body weight.
Step:2 Lower your body by bending your elbows until your upper arms are parallel to the ground.
Step:3 Pause for a moment, then push yourself back up to the starting position by straightening your arms.
Step:4 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

name: l-pull-up
instructions: Step:1 Grab the pull-up bar with an overhand grip, slightly wider than shoulder-width apart.
Step:2 Hang with your arms fully extended and your body straight.
Step:3 Engage your lats and biceps to pull your body up towards the bar, keeping your elbows close to your body.
Step:4 Continue pulling until your chin is above the bar.
Step:5 Pause for a moment at the top, then slowly lower your body back down to the starting position.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

name: l-sit on floor
instructions: Step:1 Sit on the floor with your legs extended in front of you.
Step:2 Place your hands on the floor beside your hips, fingers pointing forward.
Step:3 Engage your core and lift your legs off the ground, keeping them straight.
Step:4 Try to bring your legs parallel to the floor, forming an 'L' shape with your body.
Step:5 Hold this position for as long as you can.
Step:6 Slowly lower your legs back down to the starting position.
Step:7 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

name: lean planche
instructions: Step:1 Start in a push-up position with your hands shoulder-width apart and your body straight.
Step:2 Engage your core and slowly shift your weight forward, bringing your shoulders past your hands.
Step:3 Keep your elbows slightly bent and your body straight as you lean forward.
Step:4 Hold this position for a few seconds, then slowly return to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

name: left hook. boxing
instructions: Step:1 Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart and your knees slightly bent.
Step:2 Keep your left hand up to protect your face and your right hand by your chin.
Step:3 Rotate your hips and pivot on your left foot as you extend your left arm forward in a punching motion.
Step:4 Twist your torso and engage your core muscles to generate power in the punch.
Step:5 Snap your arm back to the starting position and repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

name: leg pull in flat bench
instructions: Step:1 Sit on a flat bench with your legs extended straight out in front of you.
Step:2 Place your hands on the bench beside your hips for support.
Step:3 Engage your abs and lift your legs off the ground, bringing your knees towards your chest.
Step:4 Pause for a moment at the top, then slowly lower your legs back down to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

name: leg up hamstring stretch
instructions: Step:1 Lie flat on your back with your legs extended.
Step:2 Bend one knee and bring it towards your chest, holding onto your thigh or shin.
Step:3 Straighten your leg as much as possible while keeping it elevated.
Step:4 Hold the stretch for 20-30 seconds.
Step:5 Repeat with the other leg.

name: low glute bridge on floor
instructions: Step:1 Lie flat on your back with your knees bent and feet flat on the ground.
Step:2 Place your arms by your sides, palms facing down.
Step:3 Engage your glutes and core, then lift your hips off the ground until your body forms a straight line from your knees to your shoulders.
Step:4 Pause for a moment at the top, squeezing your glutes.
Step:5 Slowly lower your hips back down to the starting position.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

name: lower back curl
instructions: Step:1 Lie flat on your stomach with your legs extended and your arms by your sides.
Step:2 Engage your glutes and hamstrings, and slowly lift your upper body off the ground, curling your back upwards.
Step:3 Pause for a moment at the top, then slowly lower your upper body back down to the starting position.
Step:4 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

name: lunge with jump
instructions: Step:1 Start by standing with your feet shoulder-width apart.
Step:2 Take a step forward with your right foot, lowering your body into a lunge position.
Step:3 Push off with your right foot and jump into the air, switching the position of your feet mid-air.
Step:4 Land softly with your left foot forward and immediately lower your body into a lunge position.
Step:5 Continue alternating between lunges and jumps for the desired number of repetitions.

name: lunge with twist
instructions: Step:1 Start by standing with your feet shoulder-width apart.
Step:2 Take a step forward with your right foot, lowering your body into a lunge position.
Step:3 As you lunge, twist your torso to the right, bringing your left elbow towards your right knee.
Step:4 Pause for a moment, then return to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat on the other side, stepping forward with your left foot and twisting your torso to the left.
Step:6 Continue alternating sides for the desired number of repetitions.

name: lying (side) quads stretch
instructions: Step:1 Lie on your side with your legs straight.
Step:2 Bend your top leg and grab your ankle or foot with your hand.
Step:3 Gently pull your ankle or foot towards your glutes until you feel a stretch in your quads.
Step:4 Hold the stretch for 20-30 seconds.
Step:5 Release the stretch and repeat on the other side.

name: lying elbow to knee
instructions: Step:1 Lie flat on your back with your knees bent and feet flat on the ground.
Step:2 Place your hands behind your head with your elbows pointing outwards.
Step:3 Engage your abs and lift your upper body off the ground, bringing your right elbow towards your left knee.
Step:4 At the same time, extend your right leg straight out and lift it off the ground.
Step:5 Pause for a moment, then return to the starting position.
Step:6 Repeat the movement, this time bringing your left elbow towards your right knee and extending your left leg.
Step:7 Continue alternating sides for the desired number of repetitions.

name: lying leg raise flat bench
instructions: Step:1 Lie flat on a flat bench with your back pressed against it.
Step:2 Place your hands under your glutes for support.
Step:3 Keep your legs straight and together, and lift them up towards the ceiling.
Step:4 Pause for a moment at the top, then slowly lower your legs back down to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

name: lying leg-hip raise
instructions: Step:1 Lie flat on your back with your legs extended and your arms by your sides.
Step:2 Place your hands under your glutes for support.
Step:3 Engage your core and lift your legs off the ground, raising them towards the ceiling.
Step:4 Pause for a moment at the top, then slowly lower your legs back down to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

name: lying leg-hip raise - contracted variation
instructions: Step:1 Lie flat on your back with your legs extended and your arms by your sides.
Step:2 Place your hands under your glutes for support.
Step:3 Engage your core and lift your legs off the ground, raising them towards the ceiling.
Step:4 Pause for a moment at the top, then slowly lower your legs back down to the starting position. Emphasize contracted control.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

name: macro style close-grip push-up
instructions: Step:1 Start in a high plank position with your hands placed close together, directly under your shoulders.
Step:2 Engage your core and lower your body towards the ground, keeping your elbows close to your sides.
Step:3 Push through your palms to extend your arms and return to the starting position. Maintain macro form throughout.
Step:4 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

name: march sit (wall)
instructions: Step:1 Stand with your back against a wall and your feet hip-width apart.
Step:2 Slowly slide your back down the wall until your knees are bent at a 90-degree angle.
Step:3 Lift your right foot off the ground and bring your knee towards your chest.
Step:4 Lower your right foot back down and lift your left foot off the ground, bringing your knee towards your chest.
Step:5 Continue alternating between lifting your right and left foot for the desired number of repetitions.

name: mixed grip chin-up
instructions: Step:1 Grab the pull-up bar with an underhand grip (palms facing towards you) and your hands slightly wider than shoulder-width apart.
Step:2 Hang from the bar with your arms fully extended and your feet off the ground.
Step:3 Engage your back muscles and pull your body up towards the bar, leading with your chest.
Step:4 Continue pulling until your chin is above the bar.
Step:5 Pause for a moment at the top, then slowly lower your body back down to the starting position with control.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

name: modified hindu push-up (male)
instructions: Step:1 Start in a push-up position with your hands slightly wider than shoulder-width apart and your feet hip-width apart.
Step:2 Lower your body towards the ground, bending your elbows and keeping your core engaged.
Step:3 As you lower your body, shift your weight back and lift your hips up towards the ceiling, creating an inverted V shape with your body.
Step:4 Continue to lower your body until your chest is just above the ground, then reverse the movement, pushing your hips back down and extending your arms to return to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

name: modified push up to lower arms
instructions: Step:1 Start in a push-up position with your hands directly under your shoulders and your body in a straight line.
Step:2 Lower your body down towards the ground by bending your elbows, keeping them close to your sides.
Step:3 Once your elbows are at a 90-degree angle, lower your forearms to the ground, keeping your elbows directly under your shoulders.
Step:4 Pause for a moment, then push through your palms to lift your forearms back up to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

name: monster walk
instructions: Step:1 Place a resistance band around your ankles.
Step:2 Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart and slightly bend your knees.
Step:3 Take a step to the side with your right foot, maintaining tension on the resistance band.
Step:4 Follow with your left foot, stepping to the side to return to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions, then switch sides.

name: mountain climber
instructions: Step:1 Start in a high plank position with your hands directly under your shoulders and your body in a straight line.
Step:2 Engage your core and bring your right knee towards your chest, then quickly switch and bring your left knee towards your chest.
Step:3 Continue alternating legs in a running motion, keeping your hips low and your core engaged.
Step:4 Maintain a steady pace and breathe evenly throughout the exercise.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

name: muscle up
instructions: Step:1 Start by hanging from a pull-up bar with your palms facing away from you and your arms fully extended.
Step:2 Engage your core and pull your body up towards the bar, leading with your chest.
Step:3 As you reach the top of the movement, transition your grip so that your palms are facing towards you.
Step:4 Continue pulling yourself up until your chest is above the bar and your arms are fully flexed.
Step:5 Reverse the movement by slowly lowering yourself back down to the starting position.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

name: muscle-up (on vertical bar)
instructions: Step:1 Start by hanging from a vertical bar with your palms facing away from you and your arms fully extended.
Step:2 Engage your core and pull your body up towards the bar, leading with your chest.
Step:3 As you pull yourself up, lean back slightly and bring your elbows towards your sides.
Step:4 Continue pulling until your chest reaches the bar and your elbows are fully bent.
Step:5 Pause for a moment at the top, then slowly lower yourself back down to the starting position.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

name: neck side stretch
instructions: Step:1 Stand or sit up straight with your shoulders relaxed.
Step:2 Tilt your head to one side, bringing your ear towards your shoulder.
Step:3 Hold the stretch for 15-30 seconds.
Step:4 Repeat on the other side.
Step:5 Perform 2-4 sets on each side.

name: negative crunch
instructions: Step:1 Lie flat on your back with your knees bent and feet flat on the ground.
Step:2 Place your hands behind your head with your elbows pointing outwards.
Step:3 Engaging your abs, slowly lift your upper body off the ground, curling forward until your torso is at a 45-degree angle.
Step:4 Pause for a moment at the top, then slowly lower your upper body back down to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

name: oblique crunch v. 2
instructions: Step:1 Lie on your back with your knees bent and feet flat on the ground.
Step:2 Place your hands behind your head or cross them over your chest.
Step:3 Engage your abs and lift your shoulder blades off the ground, rotating your torso to one side.
Step:4 Pause for a moment, then lower your shoulder blades back down to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat on the other side.
Step:6 Continue alternating sides for the desired number of repetitions.

name: oblique crunches floor
instructions: Step:1 Lie on your back with your knees bent and feet flat on the floor.
Step:2 Place your hands behind your head or cross them over your chest.
Step:3 Engage your abs and lift your shoulder blades off the floor, rotating your torso to one side.
Step:4 Pause for a moment, then lower your shoulder blades back down to the floor.
Step:5 Repeat on the other side, alternating sides with each repetition.

name: one arm against wall
instructions: Step:1 Stand facing a wall with your feet shoulder-width apart.
Step:2 Extend one arm straight out in front of you and place your palm against the wall.
Step:3 Engage your core and lean your body forward, keeping your arm straight and your back flat.
Step:4 Slowly push against the wall with your palm, activating your lat muscles.
Step:5 Hold the position for a few seconds, then release and repeat with the other arm.

name: one arm against wall compressed
instructions: Step:1 Stand facing a wall with your feet shoulder-width apart.
Step:2 Extend one arm straight out in front of you and place your palm against the wall.
Step:3 Engage your core and lean your body forward, keeping your arm straight and your back flat. Maintain compressed form throughout.
Step:4 Slowly push against the wall with your palm, activating your lat muscles.
Step:5 Hold the position for a few seconds, then release and repeat with the other arm.

name: one arm chin-up
instructions: Step:1 Stand facing a pull-up bar with your feet shoulder-width apart.
Step:2 Reach up and grab the bar with an underhand grip, with one hand gripping the bar and the other hand holding your wrist for support.
Step:3 Hang from the bar with your arm fully extended, keeping your body straight and your core engaged.
Step:4 Pull yourself up towards the bar by bending your elbow and squeezing your back muscles.
Step:5 Continue pulling until your chin is above the bar, then slowly lower yourself back down to the starting position.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions, then switch arms and repeat.

name: one arm dip
instructions: Step:1 Stand facing away from a bench or chair, with your feet shoulder-width apart.
Step:2 Place one hand on the bench or chair behind you, fingers pointing towards your body.
Step:3 Extend your legs out in front of you, keeping your heels on the ground.
Step:4 Bend your elbows and lower your body towards the ground, keeping your back close to the bench or chair.
Step:5 Pause for a moment at the bottom, then push through your palms to straighten your arms and return to the starting position.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions, then switch sides and repeat with the other arm.

name: one arm towel row
instructions: Step:1 Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart, knees slightly bent, and hold a towel with one hand.
Step:2 Bend forward at the waist, keeping your back straight and your core engaged.
Step:3 Extend your arm fully, allowing the towel to hang in front of you.
Step:4 Pull the towel towards your chest, squeezing your shoulder blades together.
Step:5 Pause for a moment at the top, then slowly lower the towel back to the starting position.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions, then switch arms.

name: one leg donkey calf raise
instructions: Step:1 Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart, toes pointing forward.
Step:2 Place your hands on a stable surface for support, such as a wall or a bar.
Step:3 Lift one leg off the ground, keeping your knee slightly bent.
Step:4 Raise your heel as high as possible, using your calf muscles.
Step:5 Pause for a moment at the top, then slowly lower your heel back down.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions, then switch legs.

name: one leg floor calf raise
instructions: Step:1 Stand with your feet hip-width apart and place your hands on a wall or sturdy object for balance.
Step:2 Lift one foot off the ground and balance on the other foot.
Step:3 Slowly raise your heel off the ground, lifting your body up onto the ball of your foot.
Step:4 Pause for a moment at the top, then slowly lower your heel back down to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions, then switch legs and repeat.

name: one leg squat
instructions: Step:1 Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart.
Step:2 Extend one leg forward, keeping it off the ground.
Step:3 Bend your standing leg and lower your body down as if sitting back into a chair.
Step:4 Keep your chest up and your back straight.
Step:5 Push through your heel to return to the starting position.
Step:6 Repeat with the other leg.

name: one leg squat - expanded variation
instructions: Step:1 Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart.
Step:2 Extend one leg forward, keeping it off the ground.
Step:3 Bend your standing leg and lower your body down as if sitting back into a chair.
Step:4 Keep your chest up and your back straight.
Step:5 Push through your heel to return to the starting position.
Step:6 Repeat with the other leg. Maintain expanded form throughout.

name: outside leg kick push-up
instructions: Step:1 Start in a push-up position with your hands slightly wider than shoulder-width apart and your feet together.
Step:2 Lower your body towards the ground by bending your elbows, keeping your back straight and core engaged.
Step:3 As you push back up, kick one leg out to the side, extending it fully and engaging your glutes.
Step:4 Return your leg to the starting position and repeat the push-up, alternating legs with each repetition.
Step:5 Continue alternating leg kicks and push-ups for the desired number of repetitions.

name: overhead triceps stretch
instructions: Step:1 Stand or sit upright with your feet shoulder-width apart.
Step:2 Extend one arm overhead, bending at the elbow so that your hand reaches towards the opposite shoulder blade.
Step:3 With your other hand, gently pull the elbow of the extended arm towards the opposite side of your head, feeling a stretch in your triceps.
Step:4 Hold the stretch for 15-30 seconds, then release.
Step:5 Repeat on the other side.

name: pelvic tilt
instructions: Step:1 Lie flat on your back with your knees bent and feet flat on the ground.
Step:2 Place your hands by your sides.
Step:3 Engage your abs and tilt your pelvis upward, pressing your lower back into the ground.
Step:4 Hold this position for a few seconds, focusing on contracting your abs.
Step:5 Release the tilt and return to the starting position.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

name: pelvic tilt into bridge
instructions: Step:1 Lie on your back with your knees bent and feet flat on the ground.
Step:2 Place your arms by your sides with your palms facing down.
Step:3 Engage your glutes and core muscles.
Step:4 Tilt your pelvis upward, lifting your hips off the ground.
Step:5 Hold the bridge position for a few seconds.
Step:6 Slowly lower your hips back down to the starting position.
Step:7 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

name: pike-to-cobra push-up
instructions: Step:1 Start in a push-up position with your hands slightly wider than shoulder-width apart and your feet together.
Step:2 Engage your core and lift your hips up towards the ceiling, forming an inverted V shape with your body.
Step:3 Lower your upper body towards the ground by bending your elbows, keeping them close to your body.
Step:4 As you lower down, shift your weight forward and transition into a cobra pose by straightening your arms and lifting your chest up.
Step:5 Reverse the movement by bending your elbows and lowering your chest back down towards the ground.
Step:6 Push through your hands to return to the inverted V position.
Step:7 Continue the movement by lowering your hips back down towards the ground, returning to the starting push-up position.
Step:8 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

name: plyo push up
instructions: Step:1 Start in a high plank position with your hands slightly wider than shoulder-width apart.
Step:2 Lower your chest towards the ground by bending your elbows, keeping your body in a straight line.
Step:3 Push explosively off the ground, using your chest muscles to propel your upper body off the ground.
Step:4 Land softly with your hands back in the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

name: posterior step to overhead reach
instructions: Step:1 Stand with your feet hip-width apart and your arms by your sides.
Step:2 Take a step back with your right foot, landing on the ball of your foot.
Step:3 Bend your left knee and lower your body into a lunge position.
Step:4 As you lower into the lunge, simultaneously reach your arms overhead.
Step:5 Pause for a moment at the bottom of the lunge, then return to the starting position by pushing through your left heel and bringing your right foot forward.
Step:6 Repeat the movement on the other side, stepping back with your left foot and bending your right knee.
Step:7 Continue alternating sides for the desired number of repetitions.

name: potty squat
instructions: Step:1 Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart, toes pointing slightly outward.
Step:2 Lower your body down by bending your knees and pushing your hips back as if you were sitting on a chair.
Step:3 Keep your chest up and your back straight throughout the movement.
Step:4 Lower yourself until your thighs are parallel to the ground or as low as you can comfortably go.
Step:5 Pause for a moment at the bottom, then push through your heels to return to the starting position.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

name: potty squat with support
instructions: Step:1 Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart, toes pointing slightly outward.
Step:2 Hold onto a stable support, such as a chair or wall, for balance.
Step:3 Lower your body down into a squat position by bending your knees and pushing your hips back.
Step:4 Keep your chest up and your back straight throughout the movement.
Step:5 Pause for a moment at the bottom, then push through your heels to return to the starting position.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

name: power point plank
instructions: Step:1 Start in a high plank position with your hands directly under your shoulders and your body in a straight line from head to toe.
Step:2 Engage your core and squeeze your glutes to maintain a stable position.
Step:3 Lower your body down onto your forearms, one arm at a time, maintaining a straight line from head to toe.
Step:4 Hold this position for the desired amount of time, keeping your core and glutes engaged.
Step:5 To return to the starting position, push through your forearms and lift your body back up into a high plank position.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

name: prisoner half sit-up (male)
instructions: Step:1 Lie flat on your back with your knees bent and feet flat on the ground.
Step:2 Place your hands behind your head with your elbows pointing outwards.
Step:3 Engaging your abs, slowly lift your upper body off the ground, curling forward until your torso is at a 45-degree angle.
Step:4 Pause for a moment at the top, then slowly lower your upper body back down to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

name: pull up (neutral grip)
instructions: Step:1 Hang from a pull-up bar with a neutral grip (palms facing each other) and your arms fully extended.
Step:2 Engage your core and squeeze your shoulder blades together.
Step:3 Pull your body up towards the bar by bending your elbows and driving your elbows down towards your hips.
Step:4 Continue pulling until your chin is above the bar.
Step:5 Pause for a moment at the top, then slowly lower your body back down to the starting position with control.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

name: pull-up
instructions: Step:1 Hang from a pull-up bar with your palms facing away from you and your arms fully extended.
Step:2 Engage your core and squeeze your shoulder blades together.
Step:3 Pull your body up towards the bar by bending your elbows and bringing your chest towards the bar.
Step:4 Pause at the top of the movement, then slowly lower your body back down to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

name: pure chin-up
instructions: Step:1 Hang from a pull-up bar with your palms facing towards you and your hands shoulder-width apart.
Step:2 Engage your core and pull your body up towards the bar, leading with your chest. Emphasize pure control.
Step:3 Continue pulling until your chin is above the bar.
Step:4 Pause for a moment at the top, then slowly lower your body back down to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

name: push and pull bodyweight
instructions: Step:1 Start in a push-up position with your hands slightly wider than shoulder-width apart and your body in a straight line.
Step:2 Lower your chest towards the ground by bending your elbows, keeping your body straight.
Step:3 Push through your palms to extend your arms and return to the starting position.
Step:4 From the push-up position, pull your chest towards the ground by bending your elbows, keeping your body straight.
Step:5 Push through your palms to extend your arms and return to the starting position.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

name: push to run
instructions: Step:1 Start in a push-up position with your hands shoulder-width apart and your body in a straight line.
Step:2 Lower your chest towards the ground by bending your elbows, keeping your body straight.
Step:3 Push through your hands to extend your arms and return to the starting position.
Step:4 Quickly bring one knee towards your chest, then quickly switch and bring the other knee towards your chest.
Step:5 Continue alternating knees as fast as you can while maintaining good form.
Step:6 Continue for the desired duration or number of repetitions.

name: push-up
instructions: Step:1 Start in a high plank position with your hands slightly wider than shoulder-width apart and your feet together.
Step:2 Engage your core and lower your body towards the ground by bending your elbows, keeping your body in a straight line.
Step:3 Pause for a moment when your chest is just above the ground, then push yourself back up to the starting position by straightening your arms.
Step:4 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

name: push-up (wall)
instructions: Step:1 Stand facing a wall, about arm's length away.
Step:2 Place your hands on the wall at shoulder height, slightly wider than shoulder-width apart.
Step:3 Step back a few feet, keeping your body straight and your feet hip-width apart.
Step:4 Bend your elbows and lower your chest towards the wall, keeping your body in a straight line.
Step:5 Push back up to the starting position, straightening your arms.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

name: push-up (wall) v. 2
instructions: Step:1 Stand facing a wall, about arm's length away.
Step:2 Place your hands on the wall at shoulder height, slightly wider than shoulder-width apart.
Step:3 Step back with your feet, keeping them hip-width apart.
Step:4 Engage your core and keep your body in a straight line from head to heels.
Step:5 Bend your elbows and lower your chest towards the wall, keeping your body straight.
Step:6 Pause for a moment, then push yourself back to the starting position.
Step:7 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

name: push-up (wall) with static
instructions: Step:1 Stand facing a wall, about arm's length away.
Step:2 Place your hands on the wall at shoulder height, slightly wider than shoulder-width apart.
Step:3 Step back a few feet, keeping your body straight and your feet hip-width apart.
Step:4 (static variation) Bend your elbows and lower your chest towards the wall, keeping your body in a straight line.
Step:5 Push back up to the starting position, straightening your arms.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

name: push-up inside leg kick
instructions: Step:1 Start in a push-up position with your hands slightly wider than shoulder-width apart and your feet together.
Step:2 Lower your body towards the ground by bending your elbows, keeping your back straight and your core engaged.
Step:3 As you push back up, lift one leg off the ground and kick it out to the side, keeping it straight.
Step:4 Lower your leg back down and repeat the push-up, then switch to the other leg.
Step:5 Continue alternating leg kicks with each push-up repetition.

name: push-up on lower arms
instructions: Step:1 Start in a plank position with your forearms on the ground and elbows directly below your shoulders.
Step:2 Engage your core and keep your body in a straight line from head to toe.
Step:3 Lower your chest towards the ground by bending your elbows, keeping them close to your body.
Step:4 Pause for a moment at the bottom, then push yourself back up to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

name: push-up on lower arms - resistance variation
instructions: Step:1 Start in a plank position with your forearms on the ground and elbows directly below your shoulders.
Step:2 Engage your core and keep your body in a straight line from head to toe.
Step:3 Lower your chest towards the ground by bending your elbows, keeping them close to your body. Emphasize resistance control.
Step:4 Pause for a moment at the bottom, then push yourself back up to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

name: push-up plus
instructions: Step:1 Start in a high plank position with your hands slightly wider than shoulder-width apart and your body in a straight line from head to heels.
Step:2 Lower your body towards the ground by bending your elbows, keeping them close to your sides.
Step:3 Once your chest is just above the ground, push through your hands to extend your arms and lift your upper body up.
Step:4 At the top of the movement, protract your shoulder blades by pushing your upper back towards the ceiling.
Step:5 Pause for a moment, then reverse the movement by retracting your shoulder blades and lowering your body back down to the starting position.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

name: push-up to side plank
instructions: Step:1 Start in a push-up position with your hands shoulder-width apart and your body in a straight line.
Step:2 Lower your body towards the ground by bending your elbows, keeping your core engaged.
Step:3 Push back up to the starting position.
Step:4 Shift your weight onto your left hand and rotate your body to the right, lifting your right arm towards the ceiling.
Step:5 Hold the side plank position for a few seconds, then return to the starting position.
Step:6 Repeat the push-up and side plank on the opposite side.
Step:7 Continue alternating sides for the desired number of repetitions.

name: push-up to side plank - athletic variation
instructions: Step:1 Start in a push-up position with your hands shoulder-width apart and your body in a straight line.
Step:2 Lower your body towards the ground by bending your elbows, keeping your core engaged.
Step:3 Push back up to the starting position. Emphasize athletic control.
Step:4 Shift your weight onto your left hand and rotate your body to the right, lifting your right arm towards the ceiling.
Step:5 Hold the side plank position for a few seconds, then return to the starting position.
Step:6 Repeat the push-up and side plank on the opposite side.
Step:7 Continue alternating sides for the desired number of repetitions.

name: quads
instructions: Step:1 Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart.
Step:2 Lower your body by bending your knees and pushing your hips back as if sitting on a chair.
Step:3 Keep your chest up and your back straight.
Step:4 Lower yourself until your thighs are parallel to the ground.
Step:5 Push through your heels to return to the starting position.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

name: quads complex
instructions: Step:1 Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart.
Step:2 Lower your body by bending your knees and pushing your hips back as if sitting on a chair.
Step:3 Keep your chest up and your back straight.
Step:4 Lower yourself until your thighs are parallel to the ground.
Step:5 Push through your heels to return to the starting position. Emphasize complex control.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

name: quarter sit-up
instructions: Step:1 Lie flat on your back with your knees bent and feet flat on the ground.
Step:2 Place your hands behind your head with your elbows pointing outwards.
Step:3 Engaging your abs, slowly lift your upper body off the ground, curling forward until your torso is at a 45-degree angle.
Step:4 Pause for a moment at the top, then slowly lower your upper body back down to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

name: quick feet v. 2
instructions: Step:1 Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart and your arms by your sides.
Step:2 Begin by rapidly moving your feet up and down, as if you were running in place.
Step:3 Keep your movements quick and light, focusing on staying on the balls of your feet.
Step:4 Continue for the desired duration or number of repetitions.

name: quick feet v. 2 with bent
instructions: Step:1 Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart and your arms by your sides.
Step:2 Begin by rapidly moving your feet up and down, as if you were running in place.
Step:3 Keep your movements quick and light, focusing on staying on the balls of your feet.
Step:4 Continue for the desired duration or number of repetitions. Emphasize bent control.

name: raise single arm push-up
instructions: Step:1 Start in a push-up position with your hands slightly wider than shoulder-width apart and your feet together.
Step:2 Extend one arm straight out to the side, parallel to the ground.
Step:3 Lower your body towards the ground by bending your elbows, keeping your back straight and core engaged.
Step:4 Push back up to the starting position, using your chest muscles to lift your body.
Step:5 Repeat with the other arm extended.

name: rear decline bridge
instructions: Step:1 Lie on your back with your feet flat on the ground and your knees bent.
Step:2 Place your arms by your sides with your palms facing down.
Step:3 Engage your glutes and hamstrings, and lift your hips off the ground until your body forms a straight line from your knees to your shoulders.
Step:4 Hold this position for a few seconds, then slowly lower your hips back down to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

name: rear deltoid stretch
instructions: Step:1 Stand tall with your feet shoulder-width apart.
Step:2 Extend your right arm across your chest, placing your left hand on your right elbow.
Step:3 Gently pull your right arm towards your left shoulder, feeling a stretch in your right shoulder.
Step:4 Hold the stretch for 15-30 seconds, then release.
Step:5 Repeat on the other side.

name: rear pull-up
instructions: Step:1 Grab the pull-up bar with an overhand grip, slightly wider than shoulder-width apart.
Step:2 Hang from the bar with your arms fully extended and your body straight.
Step:3 Engage your back muscles and pull your body up towards the bar, keeping your elbows close to your body.
Step:4 Continue pulling until your chin is above the bar.
Step:5 Pause for a moment at the top, then slowly lower your body back down to the starting position.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

name: reverse crunch
instructions: Step:1 Lie flat on your back with your arms extended along your sides.
Step:2 Bend your knees and lift your feet off the ground, bringing your thighs perpendicular to the floor.
Step:3 Contract your abs and curl your hips off the floor, bringing your knees towards your chest.
Step:4 Pause for a moment at the top, then slowly lower your hips back down to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

name: reverse dip
instructions: Step:1 Position yourself between two parallel bars with your arms fully extended and your body straight.
Step:2 Lower your body by bending your elbows until your upper arms are parallel to the ground.
Step:3 Pause for a moment, then push yourself back up to the starting position by straightening your arms.
Step:4 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

name: reverse grip pull-up
instructions: Step:1 Grab the pull-up bar with an underhand grip, hands shoulder-width apart.
Step:2 Hang from the bar with your arms fully extended and your body straight.
Step:3 Engage your back muscles and pull your body up towards the bar, leading with your chest.
Step:4 Continue pulling until your chin is above the bar.
Step:5 Pause for a moment at the top, then slowly lower your body back down to the starting position.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

name: reverse hyper on flat bench
instructions: Step:1 Lie face down on a flat bench with your hips at the edge and your legs hanging off the bench.
Step:2 Hold onto the bench for stability.
Step:3 Keeping your legs straight, raise them up towards the ceiling as high as you can.
Step:4 Squeeze your glutes at the top of the movement.
Step:5 Slowly lower your legs back down to the starting position.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

name: reverse plank with leg lift
instructions: Step:1 Sit on the ground with your legs extended in front of you and your hands resting on the ground behind you, fingers pointing towards your feet.
Step:2 Press through your hands and lift your hips off the ground, coming into a reverse plank position.
Step:3 Engage your core and lift one leg off the ground, extending it straight up towards the ceiling.
Step:4 Hold for a moment, then lower your leg back down.
Step:5 Repeat with the other leg.
Step:6 Continue alternating legs for the desired number of repetitions.

name: ring dips
instructions: Step:1 Start by hanging from the rings with your arms fully extended and your body straight.
Step:2 Lower your body by bending your elbows until your shoulders are below your elbows.
Step:3 Push yourself back up to the starting position by straightening your arms.
Step:4 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

name: rocking frog stretch
instructions: Step:1 Start by kneeling on the ground with your knees hip-width apart.
Step:2 Place your hands on the ground in front of you for support.
Step:3 Slowly lean forward, shifting your weight onto your hands and extending your legs behind you.
Step:4 Keep your back straight and engage your glutes as you push your hips back and up towards the ceiling.
Step:5 Hold this position for a few seconds, feeling a stretch in your glutes.
Step:6 Slowly return to the starting position by bending your knees and lowering your hips back down.
Step:7 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

name: rocky pull-up pulldown
instructions: Step:1 Stand in front of a pull-up bar with your feet shoulder-width apart.
Step:2 Reach up and grab the bar with an overhand grip, slightly wider than shoulder-width apart.
Step:3 Hang from the bar with your arms fully extended and your body straight.
Step:4 Engage your back muscles and pull your body up towards the bar, leading with your chest.
Step:5 Pause for a moment at the top, then slowly lower your body back down to the starting position.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

name: rounded twisted leg raise (female)
instructions: Step:1 Lie flat on your back with your legs extended and your arms by your sides.
Step:2 Bend your knees and lift your legs off the ground, bringing them towards your chest. Emphasize rounded control.
Step:3 As you lift your legs, twist your hips to one side, bringing your knees towards your opposite shoulder.
Step:4 Pause for a moment at the top, then slowly lower your legs back down to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat the movement, this time twisting your hips to the other side.
Step:6 Continue alternating sides for the desired number of repetitions.

name: run
instructions: Step:1 Start by standing upright with your feet hip-width apart.
Step:2 Engage your core and keep your upper body relaxed.
Step:3 Begin jogging in place, lifting your knees up towards your chest and landing softly on the balls of your feet.
Step:4 Maintain a steady pace and continue jogging for the desired duration or distance.
Step:5 Remember to breathe deeply and maintain good posture throughout the exercise.

name: run (equipment)
instructions: Step:1 Start by standing upright with your feet hip-width apart.
Step:2 Engage your core and keep your upper body relaxed.
Step:3 Begin jogging in place, lifting your knees up towards your chest and landing softly on the balls of your feet.
Step:4 Maintain a steady pace and continue jogging for the desired duration or distance.
Step:5 Remember to breathe deeply and maintain good posture throughout the exercise.

name: runners stretch
instructions: Step:1 Stand with your feet hip-width apart.
Step:2 Take a step forward with your right foot, keeping your left foot planted.
Step:3 Bend your right knee and lower your body down, keeping your left leg straight.
Step:4 Place your hands on your right thigh for support.
Step:5 Hold the stretch for 20-30 seconds, then switch sides and repeat.

name: russian twist
instructions: Step:1 Sit on the ground with your knees bent and feet flat on the floor.
Step:2 Lean back slightly while keeping your back straight and your core engaged.
Step:3 Hold your hands together in front of your chest or hold a weight if desired.
Step:4 Lift your feet off the ground, balancing on your sit bones.
Step:5 Twist your torso to the right, bringing your hands or weight towards the right side of your body.
Step:6 Pause for a moment, then twist your torso to the left, bringing your hands or weight towards the left side of your body.
Step:7 Continue alternating sides for the desired number of repetitions.

name: scapula dips
instructions: Step:1 Start by standing with your feet shoulder-width apart and your arms extended in front of you.
Step:2 Bend your knees slightly and hinge forward at the hips, keeping your back straight.
Step:3 Lower your body by bending your elbows and retracting your shoulder blades, as if you are trying to squeeze a pencil between them.
Step:4 Pause for a moment at the bottom, then push through your hands to extend your elbows and return to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

name: scapula push-up
instructions: Step:1 Start in a high plank position with your hands directly under your shoulders and your body in a straight line.
Step:2 Lower your chest towards the ground, keeping your elbows close to your body.
Step:3 As you lower, squeeze your shoulder blades together and push your chest forward.
Step:4 Pause for a moment at the bottom, then push back up to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

name: scapular pull-up
instructions: Step:1 Start by hanging from a pull-up bar with your palms facing away from you and your arms fully extended.
Step:2 Retract your shoulder blades by pulling them down and back.
Step:3 Engage your back muscles and pull your body up towards the bar, focusing on squeezing your shoulder blades together.
Step:4 Pause for a moment at the top of the movement, then slowly lower your body back down to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

name: scissor jumps (male)
instructions: Step:1 Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart.
Step:2 Jump off the ground and simultaneously cross your right leg in front of your left leg.
Step:3 As you land, quickly switch legs, crossing your left leg in front of your right leg.
Step:4 Continue alternating legs and jumping as quickly as possible.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

name: seated calf stretch (male)
instructions: Step:1 Sit on the edge of a chair or bench with your feet flat on the ground.
Step:2 Extend one leg straight out in front of you, keeping your heel on the ground.
Step:3 Lean forward slightly, feeling a stretch in your calf muscle.
Step:4 Hold the stretch for 20-30 seconds.
Step:5 Switch legs and repeat the stretch.

name: seated glute stretch
instructions: Step:1 Sit on the ground with your legs extended in front of you.
Step:2 Bend your right knee and cross your right ankle over your left thigh.
Step:3 Place your right hand on the ground behind you for support.
Step:4 With your left hand, gently press down on your right knee to deepen the stretch.
Step:5 Hold the stretch for 30 seconds to 1 minute.
Step:6 Switch sides and repeat.

name: seated leg raise
instructions: Step:1 Sit on a flat bench with your back straight and your feet flat on the ground.
Step:2 Place your hands on the sides of the bench for support.
Step:3 Keeping your legs straight, slowly raise them up in front of you until they are parallel to the ground.
Step:4 Pause for a moment at the top, then slowly lower your legs back down to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

name: seated lower back stretch
instructions: Step:1 Sit on the edge of a chair with your feet flat on the ground.
Step:2 Place your hands on your thighs or on the sides of the chair for support.
Step:3 Slowly lean forward from your hips, keeping your back straight.
Step:4 Feel the stretch in your lower back and hold for 20-30 seconds.
Step:5 Slowly return to the starting position and repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

name: seated piriformis stretch
instructions: Step:1 Sit on the ground with your legs extended in front of you.
Step:2 Bend your right knee and place your right foot on the outside of your left knee.
Step:3 Place your left elbow on the outside of your right knee and gently twist your torso to the right.
Step:4 Hold the stretch for 20-30 seconds, then switch sides and repeat.

name: seated side crunch (wall)
instructions: Step:1 Sit on the floor with your back against a wall and your legs extended in front of you.
Step:2 Bend your knees and place your feet flat on the floor, hip-width apart.
Step:3 Place your hands behind your head with your elbows pointing outwards.
Step:4 Engage your abs and lean to one side, bringing your elbow towards your hip.
Step:5 Pause for a moment, then return to the starting position.
Step:6 Repeat on the other side.
Step:7 Continue alternating sides for the desired number of repetitions.

name: seated wide angle pose sequence
instructions: Step:1 Sit on the ground with your legs extended in a wide angle.
Step:2 Flex your feet and engage your quadriceps.
Step:3 Place your hands on the ground behind you for support.
Step:4 Keeping your back straight, lean forward from your hips.
Step:5 Continue leaning forward until you feel a stretch in your hamstrings.
Step:6 Hold this position for a few breaths.
Step:7 Slowly release the stretch and return to the starting position.
Step:8 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

name: self assisted inverse leg curl
instructions: Step:1 Lie face down on a leg curl machine with your legs extended and your ankles hooked under the padded lever.
Step:2 Place your hands on the side handles of the machine for support.
Step:3 Keeping your upper body stationary, exhale and curl your legs upward as far as possible.
Step:4 Hold the contracted position for a brief pause as you squeeze your hamstrings.
Step:5 Slowly lower your legs back to the starting position while inhaling.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

name: self assisted inverse leg curl
instructions: Step:1 Lie flat on your back on a mat or bench with your legs extended.
Step:2 Place your hands by your sides or under your glutes for support.
Step:3 Bend your knees and lift your feet off the ground, bringing your thighs towards your chest.
Step:4 Pause for a moment at the top, then slowly lower your legs back to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

name: self assisted inverse leg curl (on floor)
instructions: Step:1 Lie flat on your back with your legs extended and your arms by your sides.
Step:2 Bend your knees and place your feet flat on the ground, hip-width apart.
Step:3 Lift your hips off the ground, engaging your glutes and hamstrings.
Step:4 Slowly curl your legs towards your glutes, keeping your hips lifted.
Step:5 Pause for a moment at the top, then slowly extend your legs back to the starting position.
Step:6 Lower your hips back down to the ground.
Step:7 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

name: semi squat jump (male)
instructions: Step:1 Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart.
Step:2 Bend your knees and lower your body into a squat position.
Step:3 Jump explosively, extending your hips and knees while swinging your arms for momentum.
Step:4 Land softly on the balls of your feet and immediately go into the next repetition.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

name: short stride run
instructions: Step:1 Find an open space or a treadmill to perform the exercise.
Step:2 Stand tall with your feet hip-width apart.
Step:3 Start jogging in place, lifting your knees high and pumping your arms.
Step:4 After a few seconds, start taking short strides forward, maintaining a quick pace.
Step:5 Continue running with short strides for the desired duration or distance.

name: shoulder grip pull-up
instructions: Step:1 Grab the pull-up bar with a shoulder-width grip, palms facing away from you.
Step:2 Hang freely with your arms fully extended.
Step:3 Engage your back muscles and pull your body up towards the bar until your chin is above the bar.
Step:4 Pause for a moment at the top, then slowly lower your body back down to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

name: shoulder tap
instructions: Step:1 Start in a high plank position with your hands directly under your shoulders and your body in a straight line.
Step:2 Engage your core and lift your right hand off the ground, reaching across to tap your left shoulder.
Step:3 Place your right hand back on the ground and repeat with your left hand tapping your right shoulder.
Step:4 Continue alternating shoulder taps while keeping your hips and torso stable.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

name: shoulder tap push-up
instructions: Step:1 Start in a high plank position with your hands slightly wider than shoulder-width apart and your body in a straight line from head to heels.
Step:2 Lower your body towards the ground by bending your elbows, keeping them close to your sides.
Step:3 As you push back up, lift your right hand off the ground and tap your left shoulder.
Step:4 Return your right hand to the ground and repeat the push-up, this time lifting your left hand and tapping your right shoulder.
Step:5 Continue alternating shoulder taps with each push-up repetition.
Step:6 Maintain a stable core and avoid excessive hip rotation throughout the exercise.
Step:7 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

name: side bridge hip abduction
instructions: Step:1 Lie on your side with your legs extended and stacked on top of each other.
Step:2 Prop yourself up on your forearm, keeping your elbow directly below your shoulder.
Step:3 Engage your core and lift your hips off the ground, creating a straight line from your head to your feet.
Step:4 While keeping your core engaged, lift your top leg as high as possible without rotating your hips.
Step:5 Pause for a moment at the top, then lower your leg back down.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions, then switch sides.

name: side bridge v. 2
instructions: Step:1 Lie on your side with your legs extended and stacked on top of each other.
Step:2 Place your forearm on the ground directly below your shoulder, with your elbow bent at a 90-degree angle.
Step:3 Engage your core and lift your hips off the ground, creating a straight line from your head to your feet.
Step:4 Hold this position for the desired amount of time.
Step:5 Lower your hips back down to the starting position.
Step:6 Repeat on the other side.

name: side hip (on parallel bars)
instructions: Step:1 Stand between two parallel bars with your feet shoulder-width apart.
Step:2 Place your hands on the bars and lift your body off the ground, supporting your weight on your arms.
Step:3 Engage your abs and slowly lift your legs to the side, keeping them straight.
Step:4 Pause for a moment at the top, then slowly lower your legs back down to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

name: side hip abduction
instructions: Step:1 Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart and your hands on your hips.
Step:2 Shift your weight to one leg and lift the opposite leg out to the side, keeping it straight.
Step:3 Pause for a moment at the top, then slowly lower your leg back down to the starting position.
Step:4 Repeat on the other side.
Step:5 Continue alternating sides for the desired number of repetitions.

name: side lying floor stretch
instructions: Step:1 Lie on your side with your legs straight and your bottom arm extended straight overhead.
Step:2 Bend your top knee and place your foot on the ground in front of your bottom leg.
Step:3 Reach your top arm over your head and grab onto something stable, like a wall or a piece of furniture.
Step:4 Slowly lift your bottom leg off the ground, keeping it straight, until you feel a stretch in your side.
Step:5 Hold the stretch for 20-30 seconds, then slowly lower your leg back down.
Step:6 Repeat on the other side.

name: side lying hip adduction (male)
instructions: Step:1 Lie on your side with your legs straight and stacked on top of each other.
Step:2 Place your bottom arm under your head for support.
Step:3 Engage your adductors and lift your top leg as high as possible without rotating your hips or leaning backward.
Step:4 Pause for a moment at the top, then slowly lower your leg back down to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions, then switch sides.

name: side plank hip adduction
instructions: Step:1 Start by lying on your side with your legs extended and stacked on top of each other.
Step:2 Prop yourself up on your forearm, keeping your elbow directly below your shoulder.
Step:3 Engage your core and lift your hips off the ground, creating a straight line from your head to your feet.
Step:4 While maintaining the side plank position, lift your top leg towards the ceiling, keeping it straight.
Step:5 Slowly lower your leg back down to the starting position.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions, then switch sides.

name: side push neck stretch
instructions: Step:1 Stand or sit up straight with your shoulders relaxed.
Step:2 Tilt your head to the right, bringing your right ear towards your right shoulder.
Step:3 Place your right hand on the left side of your head and gently apply pressure to increase the stretch.
Step:4 Hold the stretch for 15-30 seconds.
Step:5 Repeat on the other side, tilting your head to the left and applying pressure with your left hand.
Step:6 Repeat the stretch 2-3 times on each side.

name: side push-up
instructions: Step:1 Start by lying on your side with your legs extended and stacked on top of each other.
Step:2 Place your bottom hand on the ground directly under your shoulder, fingers pointing forward.
Step:3 Press through your bottom hand to lift your body off the ground, keeping your legs straight and your core engaged.
Step:4 Extend your top arm straight up towards the ceiling, creating a straight line from your head to your heels.
Step:5 Lower your body back down to the starting position with control.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions, then switch sides.

name: side wrist pull stretch
instructions: Step:1 Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart and your arms extended in front of you.
Step:2 Extend your right arm out to the side, parallel to the ground, with your palm facing down.
Step:3 With your left hand, grab your right hand and gently pull it towards your body, feeling a stretch in your right forearm.
Step:4 Hold the stretch for 15-30 seconds, then release.
Step:5 Repeat on the other side.

name: side-to-side chin
instructions: Step:1 Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart and your knees slightly bent.
Step:2 Grasp a pull-up bar with an overhand grip, hands slightly wider than shoulder-width apart.
Step:3 Hang from the bar with your arms fully extended and your body relaxed.
Step:4 Pull yourself up by bending your elbows and bringing your chin towards the bar, while keeping your body straight.
Step:5 Once your chin is above the bar, lower yourself back down to the starting position.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

name: side-to-side chin with reverse
instructions: Step:1 Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart and your knees slightly bent.
Step:2 Grasp a pull-up bar with an overhand grip, hands slightly wider than shoulder-width apart.
Step:3 Hang from the bar with your arms fully extended and your body relaxed.
Step:4 Pull yourself up by bending your elbows and bringing your chin towards the bar, while keeping your body straight. Perform with reverse intensity.
Step:5 Once your chin is above the bar, lower yourself back down to the starting position.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

name: side-to-side toe touch (male)
instructions: Step:1 Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart and your arms extended to the sides.
Step:2 Bend at the waist to the right, reaching your right hand towards your right foot while keeping your left hand extended to the side.
Step:3 Return to the starting position and then bend at the waist to the left, reaching your left hand towards your left foot while keeping your right hand extended to the side.
Step:4 Repeat the side-to-side bending motion for the desired number of repetitions.

name: single arm push-up
instructions: Step:1 Start in a push-up position with your hands shoulder-width apart and one hand placed slightly wider than the other.
Step:2 Engage your core and lower your body towards the ground by bending your elbows, keeping your back straight.
Step:3 As you lower yourself, shift your weight to one side and lift the opposite arm off the ground, extending it straight out to the side.
Step:4 Push through your chest and triceps to raise your body back up to the starting position, while simultaneously lowering your extended arm back to the ground.
Step:5 Repeat the movement, alternating the arm you extend with each repetition.

name: single leg bridge with outstretched leg
instructions: Step:1 Lie on your back with your knees bent and feet flat on the ground.
Step:2 Extend one leg straight out in front of you.
Step:3 Engage your glutes and lift your hips off the ground, forming a straight line from your knees to your shoulders.
Step:4 Hold for a moment at the top, then slowly lower your hips back down to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions, then switch legs.

name: single leg platform slide
instructions: Step:1 Start by standing with one foot on a platform or slide board.
Step:2 Bend your knee slightly and slide the foot on the platform backward, extending your leg.
Step:3 Keep your core engaged and maintain a straight posture throughout the movement.
Step:4 Slowly return to the starting position by sliding your foot back to the initial position.
Step:5 Repeat the movement for the desired number of repetitions, then switch legs.

name: single leg squat (pistol) male
instructions: Step:1 Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart and arms extended in front of you.
Step:2 Lift your right foot off the ground and extend it forward.
Step:3 Slowly lower your body down by bending your left knee and pushing your hips back.
Step:4 Keep your chest up and your back straight as you lower yourself down.
Step:5 Lower until your left thigh is parallel to the ground, or as low as you can comfortably go.
Step:6 Pause for a moment at the bottom, then push through your left heel to return to the starting position.
Step:7 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions, then switch legs.

name: sissy squat
instructions: Step:1 Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart and your toes pointing slightly outward.
Step:2 Hold onto a stable object for balance if needed.
Step:3 Slowly lower your body by bending your knees and leaning back, keeping your torso upright.
Step:4 Continue lowering until your thighs are parallel to the ground or as far as you can comfortably go.
Step:5 Pause for a moment, then push through your heels to return to the starting position.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

name: sissy squat isolation
instructions: Step:1 Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart and your toes pointing slightly outward.
Step:2 Hold onto a stable object for balance if needed.
Step:3 Slowly lower your body by bending your knees and leaning back, keeping your torso upright.
Step:4 Continue lowering until your thighs are parallel to the ground or as far as you can comfortably go.
Step:5 Pause for a moment, then push through your heels to return to the starting position.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions. Emphasize isolation control.

name: sit-up v. 2
instructions: Step:1 Lie flat on your back with your knees bent and feet flat on the ground.
Step:2 Place your hands behind your head with your elbows pointing outwards.
Step:3 Engaging your abs, slowly lift your upper body off the ground, curling forward until your torso is at a 45-degree angle.
Step:4 Pause for a moment at the top, then slowly lower your upper body back down to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

name: sit-up with arms on chest
instructions: Step:1 Lie flat on your back with your knees bent and feet flat on the ground.
Step:2 Cross your arms over your chest.
Step:3 Engaging your abs, lift your upper body off the ground towards your knees.
Step:4 Pause for a moment at the top, then slowly lower your upper body back down to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

name: sit-up with arms on chest with mini
instructions: Step:1 Lie flat on your back with your knees bent and feet flat on the ground.
Step:2 Cross your arms over your chest.
Step:3 Engaging your abs, lift your upper body off the ground towards your knees.
Step:4 Pause for a moment at the top, then slowly lower your upper body back down to the starting position. Maintain mini form throughout.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

name: skater hops
instructions: Step:1 Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart.
Step:2 Bend your knees slightly and jump to the right, landing on your right foot.
Step:3 As you land, swing your left leg behind your right leg and tap the ground with your left toes.
Step:4 Immediately jump to the left, landing on your left foot.
Step:5 As you land, swing your right leg behind your left leg and tap the ground with your right toes.
Step:6 Continue alternating sides, jumping and tapping the ground with each leg.
Step:7 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

name: ski step
instructions: Step:1 Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart.
Step:2 Bend your knees slightly and keep your back straight.
Step:3 Jump to the right, landing on your right foot while swinging your left leg behind your right leg.
Step:4 Immediately jump to the left, landing on your left foot while swinging your right leg behind your left leg.
Step:5 Continue alternating jumps from side to side, mimicking a skiing motion.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

name: skin the cat
instructions: Step:1 Start by hanging from a bar with your arms fully extended and your body relaxed.
Step:2 Engage your core and lift your legs up, bringing your knees towards your chest.
Step:3 Continue to lift your legs up and over your head, allowing your body to pass through the arms.
Step:4 Once your legs are fully extended over your head, begin to lower them back down towards the starting position.
