Step:5 As you lower your legs, allow your body to pass back through the arms until you are hanging with your arms fully extended again.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

name: slow leg pull in flat bench
instructions: Step:1 Sit on a flat bench with your legs extended straight out in front of you.
Step:2 Place your hands on the bench beside your hips for support.
Step:3 Engage your abs and lift your legs off the ground, bringing your knees towards your chest.
Step:4 Pause for a moment at the top, then slowly lower your legs back down to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions. Maintain slow form throughout.

name: sphinx
instructions: Step:1 Lie face down on the ground with your forearms flat on the floor, elbows directly under your shoulders.
Step:2 Engage your core and lift your chest off the ground, keeping your forearms and toes on the floor.
Step:3 Hold this position for a few seconds, making sure to keep your neck in a neutral position.
Step:4 Slowly lower your chest back down to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

name: spider crawl push up
instructions: Step:1 Start in a push-up position with your hands slightly wider than shoulder-width apart and your feet together.
Step:2 Bring your right knee towards your right elbow, keeping it off the ground.
Step:3 As you bring your right knee back, simultaneously lower your body towards the ground by bending your elbows.
Step:4 Push back up to the starting position and repeat with your left knee towards your left elbow.
Step:5 Continue alternating sides for the desired number of repetitions.

name: spine stretch
instructions: Step:1 Sit on the ground with your legs extended in front of you.
Step:2 Place your hands on the ground behind you, fingers pointing towards your body.
Step:3 Engage your core and slowly lean back, keeping your back straight.
Step:4 Continue leaning back until you feel a stretch in your spine.
Step:5 Hold the stretch for a few seconds, then slowly return to the starting position.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

name: spine twist
instructions: Step:1 Sit on the ground with your legs extended in front of you.
Step:2 Bend your knees and place your feet flat on the ground, hip-width apart.
Step:3 Place your hands behind your head with your elbows pointing outwards.
Step:4 Engage your abs and slowly twist your torso to the right, bringing your right elbow towards your left knee.
Step:5 Pause for a moment at the end of the twist, then slowly return to the starting position.
Step:6 Repeat the twist to the left side, bringing your left elbow towards your right knee.
Step:7 Continue alternating sides for the desired number of repetitions.

name: split squats
instructions: Step:1 Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart.
Step:2 Take a step forward with one foot and place it about two feet in front of the other foot.
Step:3 Lower your body by bending your knees and hips, keeping your back straight.
Step:4 Continue lowering until your front thigh is parallel to the ground, and your back knee is hovering just above the ground.
Step:5 Pause for a moment, then push through your front heel to return to the starting position.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions, then switch legs and repeat.

name: squat to overhead reach
instructions: Step:1 Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart and toes slightly turned out.
Step:2 Lower your body down into a squat position by bending your knees and pushing your hips back.
Step:3 As you come up from the squat, extend your arms overhead, reaching towards the ceiling.
Step:4 Return to the starting position by lowering your arms and bending your knees to squat down again.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

name: squat to overhead reach with twist
instructions: Step:1 Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart and toes slightly turned out.
Step:2 Lower your body into a squat position by bending your knees and pushing your hips back.
Step:3 As you come up from the squat, raise your arms overhead and twist your torso to one side.
Step:4 Return to the starting position and repeat the squat, this time twisting your torso to the opposite side.
Step:5 Continue alternating sides with each squat repetition.

name: stalder press
instructions: Step:1 Start by standing with your feet shoulder-width apart and your arms extended overhead.
Step:2 Bend your knees slightly and engage your core.
Step:3 Lower your body down into a squat position while keeping your arms extended overhead.
Step:4 As you squat down, press your arms down towards the ground, engaging your triceps.
Step:5 Pause for a moment at the bottom of the squat, then push through your heels to stand back up while simultaneously raising your arms back overhead.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

name: standing archer
instructions: Step:1 Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart and your knees slightly bent.
Step:2 Extend your arms straight out in front of you at shoulder height, parallel to the ground.
Step:3 Rotate your torso to the right, keeping your arms extended and your back straight.
Step:4 As you rotate, extend your right arm forward and your left arm back, mimicking the motion of drawing a bowstring.
Step:5 Hold the position for a moment, then return to the starting position.
Step:6 Repeat the motion, this time rotating your torso to the left and extending your left arm forward and your right arm back.
Step:7 Continue alternating sides for the desired number of repetitions.

name: standing calf raise (on a staircase)
instructions: Step:1 Stand on the edge of a step or a sturdy platform with your heels hanging off and your toes on the step.
Step:2 Hold onto a railing or wall for balance if needed.
Step:3 Slowly raise your heels as high as possible, lifting your body weight onto the balls of your feet.
Step:4 Pause for a moment at the top, then slowly lower your heels back down to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

name: standing calves
instructions: Step:1 Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart, toes pointing forward.
Step:2 Raise your heels off the ground as high as possible, standing on your toes.
Step:3 Hold the position for a moment, then slowly lower your heels back down to the starting position.
Step:4 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

name: standing calves calf stretch
instructions: Step:1 Stand facing a wall or sturdy object, about an arm's length away.
Step:2 Place your hands on the wall or object at shoulder height.
Step:3 Step back with one foot, keeping your heel flat on the ground.
Step:4 Bend your front knee slightly and lean forward, keeping your back leg straight.
Step:5 You should feel a stretch in your calf muscle.
Step:6 Hold the stretch for 20-30 seconds.
Step:7 Repeat on the other leg.

name: standing lateral stretch
instructions: Step:1 Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart and your knees slightly bent.
Step:2 Extend your arms straight out to the sides, parallel to the ground.
Step:3 Slowly lean your upper body to one side, feeling a stretch in your side and lats.
Step:4 Hold the stretch for 15-30 seconds.
Step:5 Return to the starting position and repeat on the other side.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

name: standing pelvic tilt
instructions: Step:1 Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart and your knees slightly bent.
Step:2 Place your hands on your hips or let them hang by your sides.
Step:3 Engage your core muscles and tilt your pelvis forward, pushing your lower back towards the wall behind you.
Step:4 Hold the position for a few seconds, then release and return to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

name: standing single leg curl
instructions: Step:1 Stand with your feet hip-width apart and your hands on your hips.
Step:2 Shift your weight onto your left leg and lift your right foot off the ground, bending your knee.
Step:3 Slowly curl your right heel towards your glutes, squeezing your hamstring.
Step:4 Pause for a moment at the top, then slowly lower your right foot back down to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions, then switch legs.

name: star jump (male)
instructions: Step:1 Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart and your arms by your sides.
Step:2 Bend your knees slightly and jump up explosively.
Step:3 As you jump, spread your legs and extend your arms out to the sides, forming a star shape with your body.
Step:4 Land softly on the balls of your feet with your knees slightly bent.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

name: straddle maltese
instructions: Step:1 Start by hanging from a pair of rings with your arms fully extended and your body in a straight line.
Step:2 Spread your legs wide apart, forming a straddle position.
Step:3 Engage your core and slowly lower your body until your arms are parallel to the ground.
Step:4 Hold this position for a few seconds, then push yourself back up to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

name: straddle planche
instructions: Step:1 Start in a push-up position with your hands shoulder-width apart and your feet spread wide apart.
Step:2 Engage your core and slowly shift your weight forward, bringing your shoulders over your hands.
Step:3 Bend your elbows and lower your body towards the ground, keeping your elbows close to your sides.
Step:4 Pause for a moment at the bottom, then push through your hands to straighten your arms and lift your body back up to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

name: straight leg outer hip abductor
instructions: Step:1 Lie on your side with your legs straight and stacked on top of each other.
Step:2 Place your bottom arm under your head for support.
Step:3 Engage your core and lift your top leg as high as possible without rotating your hips or leaning backward.
Step:4 Pause for a moment at the top, then slowly lower your leg back down to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions, then switch sides.

name: stretched full planche push-up
instructions: Step:1 Start in a push-up position with your hands placed slightly wider than shoulder-width apart.
Step:2 Engage your core and lower your body down towards the ground, keeping your elbows close to your sides.
Step:3 As you lower yourself, lean your body forward and lift your feet off the ground, balancing on your hands. Perform with stretched intensity.
Step:4 Continue to lower your body until your chest is just above the ground.
Step:5 Push through your hands and extend your arms to lift your body back up to the starting position.
Step:6 Maintain a straight line from your head to your heels throughout the movement.
Step:7 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

name: superman push-up
instructions: Step:1 Start in a high plank position with your hands slightly wider than shoulder-width apart and your feet together.
Step:2 Engage your core and lower your body towards the ground, keeping your elbows close to your sides.
Step:3 As you lower your body, simultaneously lift your right arm and left leg off the ground, extending them straight out.
Step:4 Pause for a moment at the top, then lower your arm and leg back down while pushing yourself back up to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat the movement, this time lifting your left arm and right leg.
Step:6 Continue alternating sides for the desired number of repetitions.

name: suspended abdominal fallout
instructions: Step:1 Attach a suspension trainer to a high anchor point and adjust the straps to waist height.
Step:2 Stand facing away from the anchor point and hold the handles with your arms extended in front of you.
Step:3 Lean forward at the waist, keeping your body straight and your core engaged.
Step:4 Lower your body as far as you can while maintaining control and tension in your abs.
Step:5 Pause for a moment at the bottom, then slowly raise your body back up to the starting position.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

name: suspended abdominal fallout - inclined variation
instructions: Step:1 Attach a suspension trainer to a high anchor point and adjust the straps to waist height.
Step:2 Stand facing away from the anchor point and hold the handles with your arms extended in front of you. Maintain inclined form throughout.
Step:3 Lean forward at the waist, keeping your body straight and your core engaged.
Step:4 Lower your body as far as you can while maintaining control and tension in your abs.
Step:5 Pause for a moment at the bottom, then slowly raise your body back up to the starting position.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

name: suspended push-up
instructions: Step:1 Find a suspension trainer and adjust it to an appropriate height.
Step:2 Stand facing away from the anchor point and hold the handles with an overhand grip.
Step:3 Walk your feet forward, leaning your body forward until your weight is supported by the suspension trainer.
Step:4 Keep your body straight from head to heels, engage your core, and lower your chest towards the handles.
Step:5 Push through your chest and arms to return to the starting position.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

name: suspended reverse crunch
instructions: Step:1 Hang from a pull-up bar with your arms fully extended and your palms facing away from you.
Step:2 Engage your core and lift your knees up towards your chest, curling your pelvis towards your ribcage.
Step:3 Pause for a moment at the top, then slowly lower your knees back down to the starting position.
Step:4 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

name: suspended row
instructions: Step:1 Set up a suspension trainer at an appropriate height.
Step:2 Stand facing the anchor point with your feet shoulder-width apart.
Step:3 Hold the handles with an overhand grip, palms facing each other.
Step:4 Lean back, keeping your body straight and your heels on the ground.
Step:5 Pull your chest towards the handles, squeezing your shoulder blades together.
Step:6 Pause for a moment at the top, then slowly lower yourself back to the starting position.
Step:7 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

name: suspended split squat
instructions: Step:1 Stand facing away from a suspension trainer with your feet shoulder-width apart.
Step:2 Extend one leg forward and place the top of your foot in the foot cradle of the suspension trainer.
Step:3 Bend your standing leg and lower your body down into a lunge position, keeping your chest up and your knee in line with your toes.
Step:4 Push through your heel to return to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions, then switch legs.

name: swimmer kicks v. 2 (male)
instructions: Step:1 Lie face down on a mat with your arms extended overhead.
Step:2 Engage your core and lift your chest and legs off the ground simultaneously.
Step:3 Kick your legs up and down in a fluttering motion, as if you were swimming.
Step:4 Continue kicking for the desired number of repetitions.
Step:5 Lower your chest and legs back down to the starting position.

name: swing 360
instructions: Step:1 Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart and knees slightly bent.
Step:2 Hold your arms straight out in front of you, parallel to the ground.
Step:3 Engage your core and swing your arms in a circular motion, rotating your torso as you do so.
Step:4 Continue the circular motion, swinging your arms and rotating your torso for the desired number of repetitions.
Step:5 Remember to breathe throughout the exercise.

name: three bench dip
instructions: Step:1 Sit on a bench with your hands gripping the edge, fingers pointing forward.
Step:2 Slide your butt off the bench, supporting your weight with your hands.
Step:3 Bend your elbows and lower your body until your upper arms are parallel to the ground.
Step:4 Push yourself back up to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

name: triceps dip
instructions: Step:1 Sit on the edge of a bench or chair with your hands gripping the edge, fingers pointing forward.
Step:2 Slide your butt off the bench, supporting your weight with your hands.
Step:3 Bend your elbows and lower your body towards the ground, keeping your back close to the bench.
Step:4 Pause for a moment at the bottom, then push yourself back up to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

name: triceps dip (bench leg)
instructions: Step:1 Sit on the edge of a bench with your hands gripping the edge, fingers pointing forward.
Step:2 Walk your feet forward, sliding your butt off the bench, and straighten your arms.
Step:3 Bend your elbows and lower your body towards the ground, keeping your back close to the bench.
Step:4 Push through your palms to straighten your arms and return to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

name: triceps dip (between benches)
instructions: Step:1 Sit on a bench with your hands gripping the edge of the bench, fingers pointing forward.
Step:2 Slide your butt off the bench, supporting your weight with your hands.
Step:3 Bend your elbows and lower your body towards the ground, keeping your back close to the bench.
Step:4 Pause for a moment at the bottom, then push yourself back up to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

name: triceps dip (between benches) - extreme variation
instructions: Step:1 Sit on a bench with your hands gripping the edge of the bench, fingers pointing forward.
Step:2 (extreme variation) Slide your butt off the bench, supporting your weight with your hands.
Step:3 Bend your elbows and lower your body towards the ground, keeping your back close to the bench.
Step:4 Pause for a moment at the bottom, then push yourself back up to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

name: triceps dips floor
instructions: Step:1 Sit on the edge of a chair or bench with your hands next to your hips, fingers pointing forward.
Step:2 Slide your butt off the front of the chair with your legs extended in front of you.
Step:3 Straighten your arms, keeping a little bend in your elbows to keep tension on your triceps and off your elbow joints.
Step:4 Slowly bend your elbows to lower your body toward the floor until your elbows are at about a 90-degree angle.
Step:5 Once you reach the bottom of the movement, press down into the chair to straighten your elbows, returning to the starting position.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

name: triceps press
instructions: Step:1 Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart and your knees slightly bent.
Step:2 Extend your arms straight out in front of you, parallel to the ground.
Step:3 Bend your elbows and lower your body towards the ground, keeping your upper arms close to your sides.
Step:4 Pause for a moment at the bottom, then push yourself back up to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

name: triceps stretch
instructions: Step:1 Stand or sit upright with your back straight.
Step:2 Extend one arm overhead, bending it at the elbow.
Step:3 Place your opposite hand on the bent elbow and gently pull it towards your head.
Step:4 Hold the stretch for 15-30 seconds, feeling a gentle stretch in your triceps.
Step:5 Release the stretch and repeat on the other arm.

name: tuck crunch
instructions: Step:1 Lie flat on your back with your knees bent and feet flat on the ground.
Step:2 Place your hands behind your head with your elbows pointing outwards.
Step:3 Engaging your abs, lift your shoulder blades off the ground and bring your knees towards your chest, simultaneously curling your upper body towards your knees.
Step:4 Pause for a moment at the top, then slowly lower your shoulder blades and extend your legs back to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

name: twist hip lift
instructions: Step:1 Lie on your back with your knees bent and feet flat on the ground.
Step:2 Place your hands by your sides for support.
Step:3 Engage your glutes and lift your hips off the ground, forming a straight line from your knees to your shoulders.
Step:4 While keeping your hips lifted, twist your lower body to the right side, bringing your knees towards the ground.
Step:5 Return to the starting position and repeat the twist to the left side.
Step:6 Continue alternating twists for the desired number of repetitions.

name: twisted leg raise
instructions: Step:1 Lie flat on your back with your legs extended and your arms by your sides.
Step:2 Place your hands under your glutes for support.
Step:3 Engage your abs and lift both legs off the ground, keeping them straight.
Step:4 As you lift your legs, twist your hips to one side, bringing your legs towards your opposite shoulder.
Step:5 Pause for a moment at the top, then slowly lower your legs back down to the starting position.
Step:6 Repeat the movement, this time twisting your hips to the other side.
Step:7 Continue alternating sides for the desired number of repetitions.

name: twisted leg raise (female)
instructions: Step:1 Lie flat on your back with your legs extended and your arms by your sides.
Step:2 Bend your knees and lift your legs off the ground, bringing them towards your chest.
Step:3 As you lift your legs, twist your hips to one side, bringing your knees towards your opposite shoulder.
Step:4 Pause for a moment at the top, then slowly lower your legs back down to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat the movement, this time twisting your hips to the other side.
Step:6 Continue alternating sides for the desired number of repetitions.

name: twisted side-to-side chin
instructions: Step:1 Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart and your knees slightly bent.
Step:2 Grasp a pull-up bar with an overhand grip, hands slightly wider than shoulder-width apart.
Step:3 Hang from the bar with your arms fully extended and your body relaxed.
Step:4 Pull yourself up by bending your elbows and bringing your chin towards the bar, while keeping your body straight.
Step:5 Once your chin is above the bar, lower yourself back down to the starting position.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions. Perform with twisted intensity.

name: two toe touch (male)
instructions: Step:1 Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart and your arms extended out to the sides.
Step:2 Bend forward at the waist, keeping your back straight and your knees slightly bent.
Step:3 Reach down towards your toes with both hands, keeping your legs straight.
Step:4 Pause for a moment at the bottom, then slowly return to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

name: upper back stretch
instructions: Step:1 Stand up straight with your feet shoulder-width apart.
Step:2 Extend your arms straight in front of you, parallel to the ground.
Step:3 Interlace your fingers and rotate your palms away from your body.
Step:4 Slowly raise your arms overhead, keeping them straight and parallel to each other.
Step:5 As you raise your arms, squeeze your shoulder blades together.
Step:6 Hold the stretch for 15-30 seconds, then release and repeat.

name: upward facing dog
instructions: Step:1 Lie face down on the floor with your legs extended behind you.
Step:2 Place your hands on the floor next to your lower ribs, fingers pointing forward.
Step:3 Press your hands firmly into the floor and straighten your arms, lifting your torso and thighs off the ground.
Step:4 Roll your shoulders back and down, opening your chest and lifting your gaze towards the ceiling.
Step:5 Hold this position for a few breaths, then slowly lower your body back down to the starting position.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

name: v-sit on floor
instructions: Step:1 Sit on the floor with your legs extended in front of you.
Step:2 Lean back slightly and lift your legs off the ground, keeping them straight.
Step:3 Simultaneously, lift your upper body off the ground and reach your arms towards your legs.
Step:4 Hold this position for a few seconds, then slowly lower your upper body and legs back down to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

name: vertical leg raise (on parallel bars)
instructions: Step:1 Hang from the parallel bars with your arms fully extended and your body straight.
Step:2 Engage your core and lift your legs up in front of you, keeping them straight.
Step:3 Continue lifting until your legs are parallel to the ground or slightly higher.
Step:4 Pause for a moment at the top, then slowly lower your legs back down to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

name: walking high knees lunge
instructions: Step:1 Stand with your feet hip-width apart.
Step:2 Lift your right knee up towards your chest as high as you can while balancing on your left leg.
Step:3 Step forward with your right foot and lower your body into a lunge position, bending both knees to a 90-degree angle.
Step:4 Push off with your right foot and bring your left knee up towards your chest.
Step:5 Step forward with your left foot and lower your body into a lunge position.
Step:6 Continue alternating legs and lunging forward, keeping your core engaged and maintaining a steady pace.
Step:7 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

name: walking lunge
instructions: Step:1 Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart.
Step:2 Take a step forward with your right leg, lowering your body into a lunge position.
Step:3 Keep your torso upright and your front knee aligned with your ankle.
Step:4 Push off with your right foot and bring your left foot forward, stepping into a lunge position with your left leg.
Step:5 Continue alternating legs and walking forward, maintaining a controlled and steady pace.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

name: wheel run
instructions: Step:1 Start in a plank position with your hands on the wheel and your body straight.
Step:2 Engage your core and start rolling the wheel forward by extending your arms.
Step:3 Continue rolling until your body is fully extended and your arms are overhead.
Step:4 Reverse the movement by pulling the wheel back towards your body, using your core and arms.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

name: wide grip pull-up
instructions: Step:1 Hang from a pull-up bar with your palms facing away from you and your hands wider than shoulder-width apart.
Step:2 Engage your core and squeeze your shoulder blades together.
Step:3 Pull your body up towards the bar until your chin is above the bar.
Step:4 Lower your body back down to the starting position with control.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

name: wide grip rear pull-up
instructions: Step:1 Grab the pull-up bar with a wide overhand grip, hands slightly wider than shoulder-width apart.
Step:2 Hang from the bar with your arms fully extended and your body straight.
Step:3 Engage your back muscles and pull your body up towards the bar, leading with your chest.
Step:4 Continue pulling until your chin is above the bar.
Step:5 Pause for a moment at the top, then slowly lower your body back down to the starting position.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

name: wide hand push up
instructions: Step:1 Start in a high plank position with your hands wider than shoulder-width apart.
Step:2 Keep your body in a straight line from head to toe.
Step:3 Lower your chest towards the ground by bending your elbows, keeping them close to your sides.
Step:4 Push through your palms to extend your arms and return to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

name: wide-grip chest dip on high parallel bars
instructions: Step:1 Position yourself on the parallel bars with your arms fully extended and your body suspended in the air.
Step:2 Lean forward slightly and lower your body by bending your elbows until your chest is just above the bars.
Step:3 Pause for a moment, then push yourself back up to the starting position by straightening your arms.
Step:4 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

name: wide-grip chest dip on high parallel bars - low variation
instructions: Step:1 Position yourself on the parallel bars with your arms fully extended and your body suspended in the air.
Step:2 Lean forward slightly and lower your body by bending your elbows until your chest is just above the bars.
Step:3 (low variation) Pause for a moment, then push yourself back up to the starting position by straightening your arms.
Step:4 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

name: wind sprints
instructions: Step:1 Find an open space or a track to perform the exercise.
Step:2 Start by standing with your feet shoulder-width apart.
Step:3 Begin running as fast as you can, pumping your arms and driving your knees up.
Step:4 Continue sprinting for a specific distance or time period.
Step:5 Rest and repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

name: world greatest stretch
instructions: Step:1 Start in a lunge position with your right foot forward and your left foot back.
Step:2 Place your hands on the ground on either side of your right foot.
Step:3 Lower your left knee to the ground and extend your right leg, keeping your right foot flat on the ground.
Step:4 Rotate your torso to the right, reaching your right arm up towards the ceiling.
Step:5 Hold this position for a few seconds, then return to the starting position.
Step:6 Switch sides and repeat the stretch with your left foot forward.

name: wrist circles
instructions: Step:1 Extend your arms straight out in front of you.
Step:2 Make a fist with both hands.
Step:3 Rotate your wrists in a circular motion, keeping your arms still.
Step:4 Continue the wrist circles for the desired number of repetitions.

name: band alternating biceps curl
instructions: Step:1 Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart and hold the band with an underhand grip, palms facing up.
Step:2 Keep your elbows close to your sides and slowly curl one arm up towards your shoulder, squeezing your biceps at the top.
Step:3 Lower the arm back down to the starting position and repeat with the other arm.
Step:4 Continue alternating arms for the desired number of repetitions.

name: band alternating v-up
instructions: Step:1 Lie flat on your back with your legs straight and your arms extended overhead, holding the band.
Step:2 Engage your abs and lift your legs and upper body off the ground simultaneously, reaching your hands towards your toes.
Step:3 As you lower your legs and upper body back down, switch the position of your legs, crossing one over the other.
Step:4 Repeat the movement, alternating the position of your legs with each repetition.
Step:5 Continue for the desired number of repetitions.

name: band alternating v-up with simple
instructions: Step:1 Lie flat on your back with your legs straight and your arms extended overhead, holding the band.
Step:2 Engage your abs and lift your legs and upper body off the ground simultaneously, reaching your hands towards your toes.
Step:3 As you lower your legs and upper body back down, switch the position of your legs, crossing one over the other. Focus on simple movement.
Step:4 Repeat the movement, alternating the position of your legs with each repetition.
Step:5 Continue for the desired number of repetitions.

name: band assisted pull-up
instructions: Step:1 Attach the band to a pull-up bar or sturdy anchor point.
Step:2 Step onto the band and grip the bar with your palms facing away from you, hands slightly wider than shoulder-width apart.
Step:3 Hang with your arms fully extended, keeping your core engaged and your shoulders down and back.
Step:4 Pull your body up towards the bar by squeezing your shoulder blades together and driving your elbows down towards your hips.
Step:5 Continue pulling until your chin is above the bar, then slowly lower yourself back down to the starting position.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

name: band assisted wheel rollerout
instructions: Step:1 Kneel on the floor and hold the handles of the band with both hands, palms facing down.
Step:2 Place the band on the ground in front of you and position your hands shoulder-width apart.
Step:3 Engage your core and slowly roll the wheel forward, extending your body as far as you can while maintaining control.
Step:4 Pause for a moment at the furthest point, then slowly roll the wheel back towards your knees to return to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

name: band bench press
instructions: Step:1 Lie flat on a bench with your feet flat on the ground and your back pressed against the bench.
Step:2 Grasp the band handles with an overhand grip, slightly wider than shoulder-width apart.
Step:3 Extend your arms fully, pushing the bands away from your chest.
Step:4 Slowly lower the bands back down to your chest, keeping your elbows at a 90-degree angle.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

name: band bent-over hip extension
instructions: Step:1 Attach the band to a sturdy anchor point at ankle height.
Step:2 Stand facing away from the anchor point with your feet shoulder-width apart.
Step:3 Step back to create tension in the band, keeping your knees slightly bent.
Step:4 Hinge at the hips and lean forward, maintaining a neutral spine.
Step:5 Extend your right leg straight back, squeezing your glutes at the top.
Step:6 Lower your right leg back down and repeat with the left leg.
Step:7 Continue alternating legs for the desired number of repetitions.

name: band bicycle crunch
instructions: Step:1 Lie flat on your back with your hands behind your head and your knees bent.
Step:2 Lift your feet off the ground and bring your right knee towards your chest while simultaneously twisting your torso to bring your left elbow towards your right knee.
Step:3 Straighten your right leg while bringing your left knee towards your chest and twisting your torso to bring your right elbow towards your left knee.
Step:4 Continue alternating the twisting motion, as if you are pedaling a bicycle, while keeping your core engaged throughout the movement.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

name: band close-grip pulldown
instructions: Step:1 Attach the band to a high anchor point, such as a pull-up bar or sturdy beam.
Step:2 Stand facing the anchor point and grab the band with an underhand grip, hands shoulder-width apart.
Step:3 Step back to create tension in the band, keeping your feet hip-width apart.
Step:4 Engage your core and keep your back straight as you pull the band down towards your chest, squeezing your shoulder blades together.
Step:5 Pause for a moment at the bottom of the movement, then slowly release the band back to the starting position.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

name: band close-grip push-up
instructions: Step:1 Place a band around your upper arms, just above the elbows.
Step:2 Assume a push-up position with your hands directly under your shoulders and your body in a straight line from head to heels.
Step:3 Bend your elbows and lower your chest towards the ground, keeping your elbows close to your sides.
Step:4 Push through your palms to extend your arms and return to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

name: band concentration curl
instructions: Step:1 Sit on a bench or chair with your legs spread apart and your feet flat on the ground.
Step:2 Hold one end of the band in your hand and step on the other end with your foot on the same side.
Step:3 Lean forward slightly and rest your elbow on the inside of your thigh, just above the knee.
Step:4 With your palm facing up, slowly curl your hand towards your shoulder, keeping your upper arm stationary.
Step:5 Pause for a moment at the top, then slowly lower your hand back down to the starting position.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions, then switch sides.

name: band fixed back close grip pulldown
instructions: Step:1 Attach the band to a fixed point above you, such as a pull-up bar or sturdy beam.
Step:2 Sit down on a bench or chair facing the band, with your feet flat on the ground and your knees bent.
Step:3 Grasp the band with a close grip, palms facing towards you.
Step:4 Keep your back straight and engage your core.
Step:5 Pull the band down towards your chest, squeezing your shoulder blades together.
Step:6 Pause for a moment at the bottom of the movement, feeling the contraction in your lats.
Step:7 Slowly release the band back to the starting position, maintaining control throughout the movement.
Step:8 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

name: band fixed back underhand pulldown
instructions: Step:1 Attach the band to a sturdy anchor point above your head.
Step:2 Stand facing the anchor point with your feet shoulder-width apart.
Step:3 Grasp the band with an underhand grip, hands slightly wider than shoulder-width apart.
Step:4 Step back to create tension in the band, keeping your arms fully extended.
Step:5 Engage your core and squeeze your shoulder blades together.
Step:6 Pull the band down towards your chest, leading with your elbows.
Step:7 Pause for a moment at the bottom of the movement, feeling the contraction in your lats.
Step:8 Slowly release the tension in the band and return to the starting position.
Step:9 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

name: band front lateral raise
instructions: Step:1 Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart and hold the band in front of your thighs with your palms facing down.
Step:2 Keep your arms straight and lift the band up in front of you until your arms are parallel to the ground.
Step:3 Pause for a moment at the top, then slowly lower the band back down to the starting position.
Step:4 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

name: band front raise
instructions: Step:1 Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart and hold the band in front of your thighs with your palms facing down.
Step:2 Keep your arms straight and slowly raise them forward until they are parallel to the ground.
Step:3 Pause for a moment at the top, then slowly lower your arms back down to the starting position.
Step:4 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

name: band hip lift
instructions: Step:1 Lie on your back with your knees bent and feet flat on the ground.
Step:2 Place a resistance band just above your knees.
Step:3 Engage your glutes and core muscles.
Step:4 Press your heels into the ground and lift your hips off the floor, squeezing your glutes at the top.
Step:5 Pause for a moment at the top, then slowly lower your hips back down to the starting position.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

name: band horizontal pallof press
instructions: Step:1 Attach the band to a sturdy anchor point at waist height.
Step:2 Stand perpendicular to the anchor point with your feet shoulder-width apart.
Step:3 Grasp the band handle with both hands and step away from the anchor point to create tension in the band.
Step:4 Bring your hands to your chest, keeping your elbows bent and close to your body.
Step:5 Engage your core and maintain a stable stance.
Step:6 Extend your arms straight out in front of you, pushing the band away from your body.
Step:7 Hold the extended position for a few seconds, focusing on maintaining tension in your core.
Step:8 Slowly bring your hands back to your chest, resisting the pull of the band.
Step:9 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

name: band jack knife sit-up
instructions: Step:1 Lie flat on your back with your legs straight and your arms extended overhead, holding the band.
Step:2 Engage your abs and lift your legs and upper body simultaneously, bringing your hands towards your feet.
Step:3 Pause for a moment at the top, then slowly lower your legs and upper body back down to the starting position.
Step:4 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

name: band kneeling one arm pulldown
instructions: Step:1 Attach the band to a sturdy anchor point above your head.
Step:2 Kneel down and hold the band with one hand, palm facing down.
Step:3 Extend your arm fully overhead, keeping your elbow slightly bent.
Step:4 Engage your lat muscles and pull the band down towards your side, bringing your elbow towards your ribcage.
Step:5 Pause for a moment at the bottom, then slowly release the tension and return to the starting position.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions, then switch sides.

name: band kneeling twisting crunch
instructions: Step:1 Attach the band to a sturdy anchor point at waist height.
Step:2 Kneel down facing away from the anchor point and hold the band with both hands, keeping your elbows bent and close to your sides.
Step:3 Engage your abs and slowly twist your torso to one side, bringing your hands towards your opposite hip.
Step:4 Pause for a moment, then slowly return to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat on the other side.
Step:6 Continue alternating sides for the desired number of repetitions.

name: band lying hip internal rotation
instructions: Step:1 Lie on your back with your legs straight and a resistance band looped around your feet.
Step:2 Bend your knees and bring them towards your chest, keeping your feet together.
Step:3 Slowly rotate your knees outwards, away from each other, while keeping your feet together.
Step:4 Pause for a moment at the end of the rotation, then slowly return to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

name: band lying straight leg raise
instructions: Step:1 Lie flat on your back with your legs straight and your feet together.
Step:2 Place the band around the arches of your feet and hold the ends of the band with your hands.
Step:3 Engaging your abs, lift both legs off the ground until they are perpendicular to the floor.
Step:4 Pause for a moment at the top, then slowly lower your legs back down to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

name: band one arm overhead biceps curl
instructions: Step:1 Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart and place one end of the band under your foot.
Step:2 Hold the other end of the band with your arm fully extended overhead, palm facing forward.
Step:3 Keeping your upper arm stationary, curl your forearm towards your shoulder, squeezing your biceps.
Step:4 Pause for a moment at the top, then slowly lower your forearm back to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions, then switch arms.

name: band one arm single leg split squat
instructions: Step:1 Stand with your feet hip-width apart and place a resistance band around your ankles.
Step:2 Extend one leg forward and rest the top of your foot on a bench or step behind you.
Step:3 Hold onto a support with one hand for balance.
Step:4 Bend your standing leg and lower your body down into a squat position, keeping your knee in line with your toes.
Step:5 Push through your heel to return to the starting position.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions, then switch legs.

name: band one arm standing low row
instructions: Step:1 Attach the band to a stable anchor point at waist height.
Step:2 Stand facing the anchor point with your feet shoulder-width apart.
Step:3 Hold the band with one hand, palm facing inward, and step back to create tension in the band.
Step:4 Bend your knees slightly and hinge forward at the hips, keeping your back straight.
Step:5 Pull the band towards your waist, squeezing your shoulder blades together.
Step:6 Pause for a moment at the top of the movement, then slowly release the band back to the starting position.
Step:7 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions, then switch sides.

name: band one arm standing low row - lateral variation
instructions: Step:1 Attach the band to a stable anchor point at waist height.
Step:2 Stand facing the anchor point with your feet shoulder-width apart.
Step:3 Hold the band with one hand, palm facing inward, and step back to create tension in the band.
Step:4 Bend your knees slightly and hinge forward at the hips, keeping your back straight.
Step:5 Pull the band towards your waist, squeezing your shoulder blades together.
Step:6 Pause for a moment at the top of the movement, then slowly release the band back to the starting position.
Step:7 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions, then switch sides. Emphasize lateral control.

name: band one arm twisting chest press
instructions: Step:1 Attach the band to a sturdy anchor point at chest height.
Step:2 Stand with your side facing the anchor point and grab the band with one hand.
Step:3 Step away from the anchor point to create tension in the band.
Step:4 Position your feet shoulder-width apart and slightly bend your knees.
Step:5 Bring your hand holding the band across your body, towards the opposite shoulder.
Step:6 While maintaining tension in the band, push your hand forward and away from your body, extending your arm.
Step:7 Slowly return to the starting position and repeat for the desired number of repetitions.
Step:8 Switch sides and repeat the exercise with the other hand.

name: band one arm twisting seated row
instructions: Step:1 Sit on a bench or chair with your feet flat on the ground and your back straight.
Step:2 Hold the band with one hand and extend your arm fully in front of you.
Step:3 Keeping your back straight, pull the band towards your body by bending your elbow and squeezing your shoulder blades together.
Step:4 At the same time, twist your torso towards the side of the pulling arm.
Step:5 Pause for a moment at the top, then slowly release the tension in the band and return to the starting position.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions, then switch to the other arm.

name: band pull through
instructions: Step:1 Attach a resistance band to a sturdy anchor point at ground level.
Step:2 Stand facing away from the anchor point with your feet shoulder-width apart.
Step:3 Step forward to create tension in the band, keeping your knees slightly bent.
Step:4 Hinge at the hips and push your glutes back, maintaining a slight bend in your knees.
Step:5 Lower your torso until it is parallel to the ground, feeling a stretch in your hamstrings.
Step:6 Drive your hips forward and squeeze your glutes to return to the starting position.
Step:7 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

name: band push sit-up
instructions: Step:1 Attach the band securely to a stable anchor point.
Step:2 Lie flat on your back with your knees bent and feet flat on the ground.
Step:3 Hold the band with both hands and extend your arms straight up towards the ceiling.
Step:4 Engaging your abs, slowly lift your upper body off the ground, curling forward until your torso is at a 45-degree angle.
Step:5 Pause for a moment at the top, then slowly lower your upper body back down to the starting position.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

name: band reverse fly
instructions: Step:1 Attach the band to a stationary object at chest height.
Step:2 Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart and hold the band with both hands in front of you.
Step:3 Keep your arms straight and lift them out to the sides until they are parallel to the ground.
Step:4 Squeeze your shoulder blades together at the top of the movement.
Step:5 Slowly lower your arms back to the starting position.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

name: band reverse wrist curl
instructions: Step:1 Sit on a bench or chair with your feet flat on the ground.
Step:2 Hold the band with an overhand grip, palms facing down, and wrap it around your fingers.
Step:3 Rest your forearms on your thighs, with your wrists hanging off the edge.
Step:4 Slowly curl your wrists upward, squeezing your forearms.
Step:5 Pause for a moment at the top, then slowly lower your wrists back down to the starting position.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

name: band seated hip internal rotation
instructions: Step:1 Sit on a chair or bench with your back straight and feet flat on the ground.
Step:2 Place a resistance band around your thighs, just above your knees.
Step:3 Keep your knees bent at a 90-degree angle and your feet shoulder-width apart.
Step:4 Engage your glutes and slowly rotate your knees outward, pushing against the resistance of the band.
Step:5 Pause for a moment at the end of the movement, then slowly return to the starting position.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

name: band seated twist
instructions: Step:1 Sit on the ground with your legs extended in front of you and your back straight.
Step:2 Wrap the band around your waist and hold the ends with both hands.
Step:3 Engage your abs and slowly twist your torso to one side, keeping your back straight and your feet on the ground.
Step:4 Pause for a moment at the end of the twist, then slowly return to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat the twist to the other side.
Step:6 Continue alternating sides for the desired number of repetitions.

name: band seated twist pure
instructions: Step:1 Sit on the ground with your legs extended in front of you and your back straight.
Step:2 Wrap the band around your waist and hold the ends with both hands.
Step:3 Engage your abs and slowly twist your torso to one side, keeping your back straight and your feet on the ground.
Step:4 Pause for a moment at the end of the twist, then slowly return to the starting position.
Step:5 (pure variation) Repeat the twist to the other side.
Step:6 Continue alternating sides for the desired number of repetitions.

name: band shoulder press
instructions: Step:1 Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart and place the band under your feet.
Step:2 Hold the band with your palms facing forward and raise your hands to shoulder height, elbows bent.
Step:3 Press the band overhead, fully extending your arms.
Step:4 Pause for a moment at the top, then slowly lower the band back to shoulder height.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

name: band shrug
instructions: Step:1 Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart and place the band under your feet, holding the ends with your hands.
Step:2 Keep your arms straight and relaxed, and let the band hang in front of your thighs.
Step:3 Engage your traps by shrugging your shoulders upward, lifting the band as high as possible.
Step:4 Hold the contraction for a moment, then slowly lower your shoulders back down to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

name: band side triceps extension
instructions: Step:1 Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart and hold the band with both hands, palms facing down.
Step:2 Extend your arms straight out to the sides, keeping them parallel to the ground.
Step:3 Slowly bend your elbows and bring your hands towards your shoulders, keeping your upper arms still.
Step:4 Pause for a moment, then slowly extend your arms back out to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

name: band single leg calf raise
instructions: Step:1 Stand with your feet hip-width apart and place the band around the ball of your left foot.
Step:2 Hold onto a stable object for balance if needed.
Step:3 Slowly raise your left heel off the ground, lifting your body weight onto the ball of your foot.
Step:4 Pause for a moment at the top, then slowly lower your left heel back down to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions, then switch to the right leg.

name: band single leg reverse calf raise
instructions: Step:1 Stand with your feet hip-width apart and place the band around the ball of your foot.
Step:2 Hold onto a stable object for balance.
Step:3 Slowly raise your heel off the ground, lifting your body weight onto the ball of your foot.
Step:4 Pause for a moment at the top, then slowly lower your heel back down to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions, then switch to the other leg.

name: band single leg split squat
instructions: Step:1 Stand with your feet hip-width apart and place a resistance band around your ankles.
Step:2 Take a big step forward with your right foot and a smaller step back with your left foot.
Step:3 Bend your knees and lower your body until your right thigh is parallel to the ground, keeping your left knee slightly above the ground.
Step:4 Push through your right heel to return to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat on the other side.

name: band squat
instructions: Step:1 Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart, with the band placed just above your knees.
Step:2 Keeping your chest up and core engaged, push your hips back and bend your knees to lower into a squat position.
Step:3 Make sure your knees are tracking over your toes and your weight is in your heels.
Step:4 Pause for a moment at the bottom, then push through your heels to return to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

name: band squat row
instructions: Step:1 Attach the band to a sturdy anchor point at waist height.
Step:2 Stand facing the anchor point with your feet shoulder-width apart.
Step:3 Hold the band handles with your palms facing each other and your arms extended in front of you.
Step:4 Bend your knees and lower into a squat position, keeping your back straight and chest lifted.
Step:5 From the squat position, pull the band handles towards your body, squeezing your shoulder blades together.
Step:6 Pause for a moment at the top, then slowly release the tension and return to the starting position.
Step:7 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

name: band standing crunch
instructions: Step:1 Attach the band to a sturdy anchor point at waist height.
Step:2 Stand facing away from the anchor point with your feet shoulder-width apart.
Step:3 Hold the band with both hands and bring it up to your chest, keeping your elbows bent and close to your body.
Step:4 Engage your abs and slowly crunch forward, bringing your chest towards your knees.
Step:5 Pause for a moment at the top of the crunch, then slowly return to the starting position.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

name: band standing rear delt row
instructions: Step:1 Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart and place the band under your feet.
Step:2 Hold the band handles with your palms facing each other and your arms extended in front of you.
Step:3 Bend your knees slightly and hinge forward at the hips, keeping your back straight.
Step:4 Pull the band towards your chest, squeezing your shoulder blades together.
Step:5 Pause for a moment at the top, then slowly release the tension and return to the starting position.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

name: band standing twisting crunch
instructions: Step:1 Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart and place the band around your upper back, crossing it in front of your chest.
Step:2 Hold the ends of the band with your hands, keeping your elbows bent and close to your sides.
Step:3 Engage your abs and twist your torso to one side, bringing your elbow towards the opposite knee.
Step:4 Pause for a moment, then return to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat on the other side.
Step:6 Continue alternating sides for the desired number of repetitions.

name: band step-up
instructions: Step:1 Place a band around your thighs, just above your knees.
Step:2 Stand facing a step or platform with your feet hip-width apart.
Step:3 Step up onto the platform with your right foot, pushing through your heel.
Step:4 Extend your left leg behind you, keeping it straight.
Step:5 Lower your left foot back down to the ground.
Step:6 Repeat with your left foot stepping up onto the platform.
Step:7 Continue alternating legs for the desired number of repetitions.

name: band stiff leg deadlift
instructions: Step:1 Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart and place the band around your ankles.
Step:2 Hold the band with both hands in front of your thighs, palms facing your body.
Step:3 Keeping your back straight and your core engaged, hinge at the hips and slowly lower your upper body towards the ground.
Step:4 As you lower, push your hips back and allow your knees to bend slightly.
Step:5 Lower the band towards the ground, feeling a stretch in your hamstrings.
Step:6 Pause for a moment at the bottom, then engage your glutes and hamstrings to lift your upper body back up to the starting position.
Step:7 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

name: band straight back stiff leg deadlift
instructions: Step:1 Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart and place the band around your upper legs.
Step:2 Hold the band with both hands in front of your thighs, palms facing your body.
Step:3 Keeping your back straight and your knees slightly bent, hinge at the hips and lower the band towards the ground.
Step:4 Feel the stretch in your hamstrings as you lower the band.
Step:5 Engage your glutes and hamstrings to lift your body back up to the starting position.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

name: band straight leg deadlift
instructions: Step:1 Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart and place the band around your feet.
Step:2 Hold the band with both hands, palms facing your body, and keep your arms straight.
Step:3 Engage your core and maintain a slight bend in your knees.
Step:4 Slowly hinge forward at your hips, keeping your back straight and chest lifted.
Step:5 Lower the band towards the ground while keeping your legs straight.
Step:6 Pause for a moment at the bottom, then squeeze your glutes and hamstrings to return to the starting position.
Step:7 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

name: band twisting overhead press
instructions: Step:1 Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart and place the band under your feet.
Step:2 Hold the band handles at shoulder height with your palms facing forward.
Step:3 Engage your core and press the band overhead, fully extending your arms.
Step:4 As you press, twist your torso to one side, keeping your hips stable.
Step:5 Pause for a moment at the top, then return to the starting position.
Step:6 Repeat the press and twist on the opposite side.
Step:7 Continue alternating sides for the desired number of repetitions.

name: band two legs calf raise - (band under both legs) v. 2
instructions: Step:1 Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart and place a resistance band under both feet.
Step:2 Hold the ends of the band with your hands for stability.
Step:3 Raise your heels off the ground as high as possible, using your calves.
Step:4 Pause for a moment at the top, then slowly lower your heels back down to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

name: band underhand pulldown
instructions: Step:1 Attach the band to a high anchor point, such as a pull-up bar or sturdy beam.
Step:2 Stand facing the anchor point with your feet shoulder-width apart.
Step:3 Grasp the band with an underhand grip, hands slightly wider than shoulder-width apart.
Step:4 Extend your arms fully overhead, keeping your elbows slightly bent.
Step:5 Engage your lats and pull the band down towards your chest, squeezing your shoulder blades together.
Step:6 Pause for a moment at the bottom of the movement, then slowly release the tension and return to the starting position.
Step:7 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

name: band underhand pulldown with classic
instructions: Step:1 Attach the band to a high anchor point, such as a pull-up bar or sturdy beam.
Step:2 Stand facing the anchor point with your feet shoulder-width apart.
Step:3 Grasp the band with an underhand grip, hands slightly wider than shoulder-width apart. Emphasize classic control.
Step:4 Extend your arms fully overhead, keeping your elbows slightly bent.
Step:5 Engage your lats and pull the band down towards your chest, squeezing your shoulder blades together.
Step:6 Pause for a moment at the bottom of the movement, then slowly release the tension and return to the starting position.
Step:7 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

name: band v-up
instructions: Step:1 Lie flat on your back with your legs straight and your arms extended overhead, holding the band.
Step:2 Engaging your abs, lift your legs and upper body off the ground simultaneously, reaching your hands towards your toes.
Step:3 Pause for a moment at the top, then slowly lower your legs and upper body back down to the starting position.
Step:4 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

name: band vertical pallof press
instructions: Step:1 Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart and wrap the band around a sturdy object at chest height.
Step:2 Hold the band with both hands and step away from the anchor point, creating tension in the band.
Step:3 Position yourself perpendicular to the anchor point, with your side facing the band.
Step:4 Extend your arms straight out in front of you, keeping your hands at chest height.
Step:5 Engage your core and press the band away from your chest, fully extending your arms.
Step:6 Hold the position for a few seconds, then slowly bring the band back towards your chest.
Step:7 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions, then switch sides.

name: band vertical pallof press - seated variation
instructions: Step:1 Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart and wrap the band around a sturdy object at chest height.
Step:2 Hold the band with both hands and step away from the anchor point, creating tension in the band.
Step:3 Position yourself perpendicular to the anchor point, with your side facing the band.
Step:4 Extend your arms straight out in front of you, keeping your hands at chest height.
Step:5 Engage your core and press the band away from your chest, fully extending your arms.
Step:6 Hold the position for a few seconds, then slowly bring the band back towards your chest.
Step:7 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions, then switch sides. Perform with seated intensity.

name: band wrist curl
instructions: Step:1 Sit on a bench or chair with your feet flat on the ground.
Step:2 Hold the band with both hands, palms facing up, and rest your forearms on your thighs.
Step:3 Slowly curl your wrists upward, squeezing your forearms.
Step:4 Pause for a moment at the top, then slowly lower your wrists back down to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

name: band y-raise
instructions: Step:1 Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart and hold the band in front of your thighs with your palms facing inwards.
Step:2 Keep your arms straight and lift them up and out to the sides, forming a 'Y' shape with your body.
Step:3 Squeeze your shoulder blades together at the top of the movement.
Step:4 Slowly lower your arms back down to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

name: controlled band straight back stiff leg deadlift
instructions: Step:1 Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart and place the band around your upper legs.
Step:2 Hold the band with both hands in front of your thighs, palms facing your body.
Step:3 Keeping your back straight and your knees slightly bent, hinge at the hips and lower the band towards the ground. Focus on controlled movement.
Step:4 Feel the stretch in your hamstrings as you lower the band.
Step:5 Engage your glutes and hamstrings to lift your body back up to the starting position.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

name: dynamic style band side triceps extension
instructions: Step:1 Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart and hold the band with both hands, palms facing down.
Step:2 Extend your arms straight out to the sides, keeping them parallel to the ground.
Step:3 Slowly bend your elbows and bring your hands towards your shoulders, keeping your upper arms still.
Step:4 Pause for a moment, then slowly extend your arms back out to the starting position.
Step:5 (dynamic variation) Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

name: fast band straight leg deadlift
instructions: Step:1 Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart and place the band around your feet.
Step:2 Hold the band with both hands, palms facing your body, and keep your arms straight.
Step:3 Engage your core and maintain a slight bend in your knees.
Step:4 Slowly hinge forward at your hips, keeping your back straight and chest lifted.
Step:5 Lower the band towards the ground while keeping your legs straight.
Step:6 Pause for a moment at the bottom, then squeeze your glutes and hamstrings to return to the starting position.
Step:7 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions. Perform with fast intensity.

name: narrow style band jack knife sit-up
instructions: Step:1 Lie flat on your back with your legs straight and your arms extended overhead, holding the band.
Step:2 Engage your abs and lift your legs and upper body simultaneously, bringing your hands towards your feet.
Step:3 Pause for a moment at the top, then slowly lower your legs and upper body back down to the starting position.
Step:4 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions. Focus on narrow movement.

name: rough band hip lift
instructions: Step:1 Lie on your back with your knees bent and feet flat on the ground.
Step:2 Place a resistance band just above your knees.
Step:3 Engage your glutes and core muscles.
Step:4 Press your heels into the ground and lift your hips off the floor, squeezing your glutes at the top.
Step:5 Pause for a moment at the top, then slowly lower your hips back down to the starting position.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions. Focus on rough movement.

name: rough band push sit-up
instructions: Step:1 Attach the band securely to a stable anchor point.
Step:2 Lie flat on your back with your knees bent and feet flat on the ground.
Step:3 Hold the band with both hands and extend your arms straight up towards the ceiling. Focus on rough movement.
Step:4 Engaging your abs, slowly lift your upper body off the ground, curling forward until your torso is at a 45-degree angle.
Step:5 Pause for a moment at the top, then slowly lower your upper body back down to the starting position.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

name: stability style band kneeling one arm pulldown
instructions: Step:1 Attach the band to a sturdy anchor point above your head.
Step:2 Kneel down and hold the band with one hand, palm facing down.
Step:3 Extend your arm fully overhead, keeping your elbow slightly bent.
Step:4 Engage your lat muscles and pull the band down towards your side, bringing your elbow towards your ribcage.
Step:5 Pause for a moment at the bottom, then slowly release the tension and return to the starting position.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions, then switch sides. Perform with stability intensity.

name: supine style band alternating v-up
instructions: Step:1 Lie flat on your back with your legs straight and your arms extended overhead, holding the band.
Step:2 Engage your abs and lift your legs and upper body off the ground simultaneously, reaching your hands towards your toes.
Step:3 As you lower your legs and upper body back down, switch the position of your legs, crossing one over the other. Focus on supine movement.
Step:4 Repeat the movement, alternating the position of your legs with each repetition.
Step:5 Continue for the desired number of repetitions.

name: controlled wrist rollerer
instructions: Step:1 Attach a weight to one end of a rope or bar.
Step:2 Hold the other end of the rope or bar with both hands, palms facing down.
Step:3 Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart and your arms fully extended in front of you.
Step:4 Slowly roll the weight up towards your hands by flexing your wrists.
Step:5 Pause for a moment at the top, then slowly lower the weight back down to the starting position. Perform with controlled intensity.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

name: fierce weighted straight bar dip
instructions: Step:1 Position yourself between parallel bars with your arms fully extended and your body straight.
Step:2 Lower your body by bending your elbows until your upper arms are parallel to the ground.
Step:3 Pause for a moment, then push yourself back up to the starting position by straightening your arms.
Step:4 (fierce variation) Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

name: macro style weighted one hand pull up
instructions: Step:1 Grab the pull-up bar with an overhand grip, slightly wider than shoulder-width apart.
Step:2 Hang from the bar with your arm fully extended and your body straight. Perform with macro intensity.
Step:3 Engage your core and pull your body up towards the bar by bending your elbow and squeezing your back muscles.
Step:4 Continue pulling until your chin is above the bar.
Step:5 Lower your body back down to the starting position with control.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

name: otis up
instructions: Step:1 Lie flat on your back with your knees bent and feet flat on the ground.
Step:2 Place your hands behind your head with your elbows pointing outwards.
Step:3 Engaging your abs, slowly lift your upper body off the ground, curling forward until your torso is at a 45-degree angle.
Step:4 Pause for a moment at the top, then slowly lower your upper body back down to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

name: weighted bench dip
instructions: Step:1 Sit on a bench with your hands gripping the edge, fingers pointing forward.
Step:2 Slide your butt off the bench, supporting your weight with your hands.
Step:3 Lower your body by bending your elbows until your upper arms are parallel to the floor.
Step:4 Push yourself back up to the starting position by straightening your arms.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

name: weighted close grip chin-up on dip cage
instructions: Step:1 Stand in front of the dip cage and grab the parallel bars with an underhand grip, hands shoulder-width apart.
Step:2 Hang from the bars with your arms fully extended, feet off the ground, and body straight.
Step:3 Engage your back muscles and pull your body up towards the bars, keeping your elbows close to your sides.
Step:4 Continue pulling until your chin is above the bars, then pause for a moment.
Step:5 Slowly lower your body back down to the starting position, fully extending your arms.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

name: weighted cossack squats (male)
instructions: Step:1 Stand with your feet wider than shoulder-width apart and toes pointing slightly outward.
Step:2 Hold a weight in front of your chest with both hands.
Step:3 Shift your weight to one side and lower your body by bending the knee of the side you shifted towards, while keeping the other leg straight.
Step:4 Go as low as you can while maintaining balance and keeping your chest up.
Step:5 Push through the heel of the bent leg to return to the starting position.
Step:6 Repeat on the other side, alternating between legs.

name: weighted crunch
instructions: Step:1 Lie flat on your back with your knees bent and feet flat on the ground.
Step:2 Hold a weight plate or dumbbell on your chest.
Step:3 Engage your abs and lift your upper body off the ground, curling forward until your shoulder blades are off the ground.
Step:4 Pause for a moment at the top, then slowly lower your upper body back down to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

name: weighted decline sit-up
instructions: Step:1 Lie flat on a decline bench with your feet secured under the foot pads.
Step:2 Place your hands behind your head or across your chest.
Step:3 Engage your abs and slowly lift your upper body off the bench, curling forward until your torso is perpendicular to the ground.
Step:4 Pause for a moment at the top, then slowly lower your upper body back down to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

name: weighted donkey calf raise
instructions: Step:1 Stand on a raised platform with your toes on the edge and your heels hanging off.
Step:2 Hold onto a stable object for support.
Step:3 Raise your heels as high as possible by extending your ankles.
Step:4 Pause for a moment at the top, then slowly lower your heels back down to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

name: weighted drop push up
instructions: Step:1 Start in a high plank position with your hands slightly wider than shoulder-width apart and your feet together.
Step:2 Lower your chest towards the ground, keeping your elbows close to your body.
Step:3 Once your chest is just above the ground, explosively push yourself up, lifting your hands off the ground.
Step:4 As you push up, quickly move your hands out to the sides and slightly forward, allowing your body to drop down towards the ground.
Step:5 Catch yourself with your hands in the wider position and immediately lower your chest towards the ground again.
Step:6 Repeat the push-up motion, dropping down and catching yourself with your hands in the narrower position.
Step:7 Continue alternating between the wider and narrower hand positions for the desired number of repetitions.

name: weighted front plank
instructions: Step:1 Start by lying face down on the floor.
Step:2 Place your forearms on the ground, with your elbows directly under your shoulders.
Step:3 Extend your legs straight out behind you, with your toes on the ground.
Step:4 Engage your core and lift your body off the ground, balancing on your forearms and toes.
Step:5 Keep your body in a straight line from your head to your heels.
Step:6 Hold this position for the desired amount of time.
Step:7 Lower your body back down to the starting position.
Step:8 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

name: weighted front raise
instructions: Step:1 Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart, holding a dumbbell in each hand with your palms facing your thighs.
Step:2 Keeping your arms straight, exhale and lift the dumbbells in front of you until they are at shoulder level.
Step:3 Pause for a moment at the top, then inhale and slowly lower the dumbbells back down to the starting position.
Step:4 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

name: weighted hanging leg-hip raise
instructions: Step:1 Hang from a pull-up bar with your arms fully extended and your palms facing away from you.
Step:2 Engage your core and lift your legs up in front of you, keeping them straight.
Step:3 Continue lifting until your legs are parallel to the ground or slightly higher.
Step:4 Pause for a moment at the top, then slowly lower your legs back down to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

name: weighted hyperextension (on stability ball)
instructions: Step:1 Position yourself face down on a stability ball with your hips resting on the ball and your feet against a wall for stability.
Step:2 Place your hands behind your head or cross them over your chest.
Step:3 Engage your core and slowly lift your upper body off the ball, extending your back until your body forms a straight line.
Step:4 Pause for a moment at the top, then slowly lower your upper body back down to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

name: weighted kneeling step with swing
instructions: Step:1 Start in a kneeling position with your knees hip-width apart and your back straight.
Step:2 Hold a weight in each hand, with your arms extended straight down in front of you.
Step:3 Engage your core and swing the weights up and overhead, keeping your arms straight.
Step:4 Lower the weights back down to the starting position and repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

name: weighted lunge with swing
instructions: Step:1 Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart, holding a weight in each hand.
Step:2 Take a step forward with your right foot, lowering your body into a lunge position.
Step:3 As you lunge forward, swing the weights forward and upward, keeping your arms straight.
Step:4 Push off with your right foot and return to the starting position, swinging the weights back down.
Step:5 Repeat with your left foot and continue alternating legs for the desired number of repetitions.

name: weighted lunge with swing twisted
instructions: Step:1 Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart, holding a weight in each hand.
Step:2 Take a step forward with your right foot, lowering your body into a lunge position.
Step:3 As you lunge forward, swing the weights forward and upward, keeping your arms straight.
Step:4 Push off with your right foot and return to the starting position, swinging the weights back down.
Step:5 (twisted variation) Repeat with your left foot and continue alternating legs for the desired number of repetitions.

name: weighted muscle up
instructions: Step:1 Start by hanging from a pull-up bar with your palms facing away from you and your hands slightly wider than shoulder-width apart.
Step:2 Engage your core and pull your body up towards the bar, leading with your chest.
Step:3 As you reach the top of the movement, transition your grip so that your palms are facing towards you.
Step:4 Continue pulling yourself up until your chest reaches the bar, then pause for a moment.
Step:5 Slowly lower yourself back down to the starting position, maintaining control throughout the movement.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

name: weighted muscle up (on bar)
instructions: Step:1 Start by hanging from a pull-up bar with your palms facing away from you and your hands slightly wider than shoulder-width apart.
Step:2 Engage your core and pull your shoulder blades down and back.
Step:3 Bend your elbows and pull your chest towards the bar, keeping your body straight.
Step:4 Once your chest reaches the bar, push down with your hands and drive your elbows back, lifting your body above the bar.
Step:5 Pause at the top of the movement, then slowly lower yourself back down to the starting position.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

name: weighted one hand pull up
instructions: Step:1 Grab the pull-up bar with an overhand grip, slightly wider than shoulder-width apart.
Step:2 Hang from the bar with your arm fully extended and your body straight.
Step:3 Engage your core and pull your body up towards the bar by bending your elbow and squeezing your back muscles.
Step:4 Continue pulling until your chin is above the bar.
Step:5 Lower your body back down to the starting position with control.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

name: weighted one hand pull up fast
instructions: Step:1 Grab the pull-up bar with an overhand grip, slightly wider than shoulder-width apart.
Step:2 Hang from the bar with your arm fully extended and your body straight.
Step:3 Engage your core and pull your body up towards the bar by bending your elbow and squeezing your back muscles.
Step:4 Continue pulling until your chin is above the bar.
Step:5 (fast variation) Lower your body back down to the starting position with control.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

name: weighted overhead crunch (on stability ball)
instructions: Step:1 Sit on a stability ball with your feet flat on the ground and your knees bent at a 90-degree angle.
Step:2 Hold a weight plate or dumbbell with both hands and extend your arms overhead.
Step:3 Engage your abs and slowly curl your torso forward, bringing your chest towards your knees.
Step:4 Pause for a moment at the top, then slowly lower your torso back to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

name: weighted pull-up
instructions: Step:1 Grab the pull-up bar with an overhand grip, slightly wider than shoulder-width apart.
