Step:2 Hang from the bar with your arms fully extended and your body straight.
Step:3 Engage your back muscles and pull your body up towards the bar, keeping your elbows close to your body.
Step:4 Continue pulling until your chin is above the bar.
Step:5 Pause for a moment at the top, then slowly lower your body back down to the starting position.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

name: weighted round arm
instructions: Step:1 Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart and hold a dumbbell in each hand.
Step:2 Bend your knees slightly and hinge forward at the hips, keeping your back straight.
Step:3 Raise your arms out to the sides, keeping a slight bend in your elbows.
Step:4 Continue lifting your arms until they are parallel to the ground.
Step:5 Pause for a moment at the top, then slowly lower your arms back down to the starting position.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

name: weighted russian twist
instructions: Step:1 Sit on the ground with your knees bent and your feet flat on the floor.
Step:2 Hold a weight or medicine ball with both hands in front of your chest.
Step:3 Lean back slightly, keeping your back straight and your core engaged.
Step:4 Slowly twist your torso to the right, bringing the weight or medicine ball towards the floor on your right side.
Step:5 Pause for a moment, then twist your torso to the left, bringing the weight or medicine ball towards the floor on your left side.
Step:6 Continue alternating sides for the desired number of repetitions.

name: weighted russian twist (legs up)
instructions: Step:1 Sit on the ground with your knees bent and feet lifted off the ground, keeping your legs together.
Step:2 Hold the weight with both hands in front of your chest, keeping your elbows slightly bent.
Step:3 Lean back slightly to engage your core muscles.
Step:4 Twist your torso to the right, bringing the weight towards the ground on your right side.
Step:5 Pause for a moment, then twist your torso to the left, bringing the weight towards the ground on your left side.
Step:6 Continue alternating sides for the desired number of repetitions.

name: weighted russian twist v. 2
instructions: Step:1 Sit on the ground with your knees bent and feet flat on the floor.
Step:2 Hold the weight with both hands in front of your chest.
Step:3 Lean back slightly to engage your core muscles.
Step:4 Twist your torso to the right, bringing the weight towards the right side of your body.
Step:5 Pause for a moment, then twist your torso to the left, bringing the weight towards the left side of your body.
Step:6 Continue alternating sides for the desired number of repetitions.

name: weighted seated twist (on stability ball)
instructions: Step:1 Sit on a stability ball with your feet flat on the ground and your knees bent at a 90-degree angle.
Step:2 Hold a weight plate or dumbbell with both hands close to your chest.
Step:3 Engage your core and slowly rotate your torso to one side, keeping your hips stable.
Step:4 Pause for a moment at the end of the rotation, then slowly return to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat the rotation to the other side.
Step:6 Continue alternating sides for the desired number of repetitions.

name: weighted side bend (on stability ball)
instructions: Step:1 Sit on a stability ball with your feet shoulder-width apart and flat on the ground.
Step:2 Hold a weight in one hand and place your other hand on your hip.
Step:3 Engage your core and slowly bend sideways towards the weighted side, keeping your back straight.
Step:4 Pause for a moment at the bottom, then slowly return to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions, then switch sides.

name: weighted sissy squat
instructions: Step:1 Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart and your toes pointing slightly outward.
Step:2 Hold a weight in front of your chest with both hands, or place a barbell across your upper back.
Step:3 Keeping your chest up and your core engaged, slowly lower your body down by bending at the knees and hips.
Step:4 Continue lowering until your thighs are parallel to the ground or as low as you can comfortably go.
Step:5 Pause for a moment at the bottom, then push through your heels to return to the starting position.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

name: weighted squat
instructions: Step:1 Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart, toes pointing slightly outward.
Step:2 Hold a weight in front of your chest or on your shoulders.
Step:3 Engage your core and keep your chest up as you lower your hips down and back, as if sitting into a chair.
Step:4 Lower until your thighs are parallel to the ground, or as low as you can comfortably go.
Step:5 Push through your heels to stand back up, squeezing your glutes at the top.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

name: weighted standing curl
instructions: Step:1 Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart and hold a dumbbell in each hand, palms facing forward.
Step:2 Keep your elbows close to your torso and exhale as you curl the weights up to shoulder level.
Step:3 Pause for a moment at the top, then inhale as you slowly lower the weights back down to the starting position.
Step:4 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

name: weighted standing hand squeeze
instructions: Step:1 Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart and hold a weight in each hand.
Step:2 Extend your arms straight in front of you, palms facing each other.
Step:3 Squeeze your hands together as hard as you can, engaging your forearms.
Step:4 Hold the squeeze for a few seconds, then release.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

name: weighted straight bar dip
instructions: Step:1 Position yourself between parallel bars with your arms fully extended and your body straight.
Step:2 Lower your body by bending your elbows until your upper arms are parallel to the ground.
Step:3 Pause for a moment, then push yourself back up to the starting position by straightening your arms.
Step:4 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

name: weighted stretch lunge
instructions: Step:1 Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart.
Step:2 Take a step forward with your right foot, keeping your back straight.
Step:3 Lower your body by bending your knees until your right thigh is parallel to the ground.
Step:4 Push through your right heel to return to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat with your left leg.
Step:6 Continue alternating legs for the desired number of repetitions.

name: weighted svend press
instructions: Step:1 Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart and hold a weight plate in front of your chest with both hands.
Step:2 Keep your elbows slightly bent and your palms facing each other.
Step:3 Press the weight plate straight out in front of you, fully extending your arms.
Step:4 Pause for a moment at the end of the movement, then slowly bring the weight plate back to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

name: weighted three bench dips
instructions: Step:1 Sit on the edge of a bench with your hands gripping the edge, fingers pointing forward.
Step:2 Walk your feet forward, sliding your butt off the bench and supporting your weight with your arms.
Step:3 Lower your body by bending your elbows, keeping your back close to the bench.
Step:4 Pause for a moment at the bottom, then push yourself back up to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

name: weighted tricep dips
instructions: Step:1 Sit on the edge of a bench or chair with your hands gripping the edge next to your hips.
Step:2 Slide your butt off the front of the bench with your legs extended in front of you.
Step:3 Keep your back close to the bench and your elbows slightly bent.
Step:4 Lower your body by bending your elbows until your upper arms are parallel to the floor.
Step:5 Push yourself back up to the starting position by straightening your arms.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

name: weighted triceps dip on high parallel bars
instructions: Step:1 Position yourself between two parallel bars with your hands gripping the bars and your arms fully extended.
Step:2 Bend your elbows and lower your body until your upper arms are parallel to the ground.
Step:3 Pause for a moment, then push through your palms to straighten your arms and return to the starting position.
Step:4 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

name: wrist rollerer
instructions: Step:1 Attach a weight to one end of a rope or bar.
Step:2 Hold the other end of the rope or bar with both hands, palms facing down.
Step:3 Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart and your arms fully extended in front of you.
Step:4 Slowly roll the weight up towards your hands by flexing your wrists.
Step:5 Pause for a moment at the top, then slowly lower the weight back down to the starting position.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.
